1a1(phal chen): @#/ /phal chen nga pa bzhugs so//
1b1(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam
1b2(phal chen): po drug cu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas /
1b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
1b4(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas
2a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ji
2a2(phal chen): tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
2a3(phal chen): gdung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
2a4(phal chen): skye ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin
2a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de
2b1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
2b2(phal chen): ye shes ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni
2b3(phal chen): ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu
2b4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab
2b5(phal chen): snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ byang chub
2b6(phal chen): sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi byin dang ldan
3a1(phal chen): par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs
3a2(phal chen): su rgyas par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la rab tu bzhag go /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud
3a3(phal chen): par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /chags pa med pa'i rgyud
3a4(phal chen): 'byams klas pa la rab tu bzhag go / sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rigs rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /
3a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du med pa la rab tu bzhag pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying pos
3a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rig cing khong du chud pas/ chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs pa'i yid dang / chos thams
3b1(phal chen): cad la bsgribs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su
3b2(phal chen): song ba'i sangs rgyas blta ba dang / snying rje chen pos lta ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
3b3(phal chen): rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang / tha dad
3b4(phal chen): pa yang dag par shes pa'i rnam pa/ gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
3b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa
3b6(phal chen): chen po la rnam par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la sku'i mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu brnyes pa'o/ /
3b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang dgongs pas sbyar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tha dad pa yang dag par
4a1(phal chen): mkhyen pa bzhi ni brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
4a2(phal chen): cad la bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs ni tshad med pa'o/ /sangs
4a3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni/
4a4(phal chen): thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing bstan pa ni bsgribs pa med pa'i
4a5(phal chen): mthar thug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa bcu
4a6(phal chen): ste| bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa med par rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o//
4a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyan ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi spyan mngon par sangs rgyas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /
4b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i snyan ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
4b2(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags
4b3(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chos nyid ni/ sems
4b4(phal chen): can thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dmigs pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin
4b5(phal chen): las ni/ chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing / dus gsum chags pa med par thugs su chud cing rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
4b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba la rnam par spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul mi zad pa yang dag par ston pas mtha'
4b7(phal chen): dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
5a1(phal chen): zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bstan te/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /
5a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ rnam par rol ba'i ye shes kyi chos yongs
5a3(phal chen): su rdzogs te/ chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
5a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
5a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig gcig la ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten
5a6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su
5a7(phal chen): bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang
5b1(phal chen): chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad
5b2(phal chen): c ig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dus la bab par shes pas sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba yongs su bstan pa
5b3(phal chen): dang | skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam
5b4(phal chen): par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu
5b5(phal chen): phyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su
5b6(phal chen): bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang / brtson 'grus
5b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba dang / mos pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
6a1(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal
6a2(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon
6a3(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par ma smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni/
6a4(phal chen): de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las
6a5(phal chen): mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da'
6a6(phal chen): bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongs su bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi
6a7(phal chen): 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
6b1(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams yul dang grong dang grong rdal du gshegs pa ni/ de'i dus la mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i
6b2(phal chen): tshul bzhin du sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan
6b3(phal chen): zhing gdul dka' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam
6b4(phal chen): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
6b5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam
6b6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba dang / dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su
6b7(phal chen): bstan pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sku gzugs gcig gis lus dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa
7a1(phal chen): dang | gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur ba dang / ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams
7a2(phal chen): cad la bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs gcig bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kye che ba nyid tshad med pa dang
7a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'gro ba thams
7a4(phal chen): cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa
7a5(phal chen): ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di
7a6(phal chen): dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jug pa med pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas smon
7a7(phal chen): lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / lus med pa la lus mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye
7b1(phal chen): shes dang / sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par
7b2(phal chen): sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / yul thams cad mngon par 'du bya
7b3(phal chen): ba med pa la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa la chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams
7b4(phal chen): cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas 'jug pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa la
7b5(phal chen): skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas
7b6(phal chen): kyi mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs
7b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni/ dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul
8a1(phal chen): bar mdzad pa ni/ cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa ni/
8a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha dad pa yang
8a3(phal chen): dag par mkhyen pa bzhir khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni/ thugs rje chen po'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs
8a4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
8a5(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ sems can rnam par gdul ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' bar
8a6(phal chen): spyod pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gcig tu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
8a7(phal chen): rgyas skye ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni/ dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khong du chud par bstan pa thams cad khongs
8b1(phal chen): su chud pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
8b2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms zhing rnam par 'thor ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8b3(phal chen): rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos
8b4(phal chen): bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /
8b5(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /
8b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma
8b7(phal chen): lus par skus khyab cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gnyis pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod
9a1(phal chen): par dka' ba'o/ /gsung gi yan lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba don yod par tha dad pa yang dag par
9a2(phal chen): mkhyen pa thogs pa med pas bstan pa'i tshul du tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhi 'byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o//
9a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa
9a4(phal chen): med pa'i tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi thabs kyis 'byung zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni/
9a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tu phra ba
9a6(phal chen): gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang / chos kyi 'khor
9a7(phal chen): lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing / sems can rnam par 'dul ba thogs pa med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang / gnod pa med kyang rdul
9b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba de yang yangs par ma byas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chung bar ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni/ sangs rgyas
9b2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /mun pa med pa'i khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
9b3(phal chen): mun pa med cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la/ sems can pha rol gyi bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan
9b4(phal chen): pa ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos la bzod par dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin
9b5(phal chen): tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing
9b6(phal chen): shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par bsgrubs pa bdag nyid che ba ni/ sngon gyi mtha' nas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
9b7(phal chen): cing rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che
10a1(phal chen): ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10a2(phal chen): 'das rnams ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha
10a3(phal chen): na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom
10a4(phal chen): pas| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
10a5(phal chen): dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par gzhag pa gcig gis len pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
10a6(phal chen): cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas mnyam pa'i bsod nams mi zad pa
10a7(phal chen): dang ldan pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par
10b1(phal chen): dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags
10b2(phal chen): pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b3(phal chen): 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pas bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs shing khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin te/ rgol ba'i nang na stag lta bu'i mthu dang ldan la/ chos
10b4(phal chen): thams cad bstan pa la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag
10b5(phal chen): p a'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs
10b6(phal chen): pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon shin tu sbyong zhing / mya ngan las 'das nas de srid kyi yun ring po 'das kyang / sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan zad par mi 'gyur bas/
10b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i
11a1(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa dag na bzhugs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
11a2(phal chen): kyis rjes su dran par byas na/ sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par
11a3(phal chen): dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /
11a4(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas
11a5(phal chen): kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa la/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis
11a6(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
11a7(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
11b1(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas shin tu
11b2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi sku rnyog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
11b3(phal chen): shes kyi phung po bsgribs pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po brnyes shing / pha rol tu
11b4(phal chen): phyin pa dam pa brnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
11b5(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
11b6(phal chen): pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / sems can sems cad shes dang ldan pa rnams la dus thams cad du chos bstan pa dang / sems can
11b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dus thams cad du bskyed pa dang / chos skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par
12a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams
12a2(phal chen): cad du dus thams cad du chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12a3(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus thams cad du thogs
12a4(phal chen): pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
12a5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing / dus thams cad du gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin
12a6(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
12a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa brnyes pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad
12b1(phal chen): pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis
12b2(phal chen): mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi tshar mngon par 'bebs pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12b3(phal chen): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam
12b4(phal chen): dang khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub pas
12b5(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
12b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
12b7(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
13a1(phal chen): tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin
13a2(phal chen): no| |'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi mkhyen pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang
13a3(phal chen): ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang stobs bcu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
13a4(phal chen): rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/
13a5(phal chen): thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba yang dag par zhugs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad
13a6(phal chen): kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba
13a7(phal chen): 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la rab tu gzhol ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas
13b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / dul bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul mu med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su
13b2(phal chen): mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul
13b3(phal chen): lo| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
13b4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha'
13b5(phal chen): yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
13b6(phal chen): ni sems can thams cad la gdams ngag dang / man ngag shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong
13b7(phal chen): ba'i nan tan gyi sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang / man ngag gis yongs su gzhog pa'i sgor
14a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par gyi smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor
14a2(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
14a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs
14a4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni bskal
14a5(phal chen): pa yangs pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang / yongs su bshad pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
14a6(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
14a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su bstan pa ni/ sems
14b1(phal chen): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14b2(phal chen): rnams len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
14b3(phal chen): las sgrub bo/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
14b4(phal chen): ni byin gyi rlabs kyi yul dang mi dmigs pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang
14b5(phal chen): sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la dmigs par mdzad pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
14b6(phal chen): sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
14b7(phal chen): rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
15a1(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa'o/ / //bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
15a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos te/ bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam chen po la rab tu brtan zhing smon lam zhig pa mi mnga' bas ji skad du gsung ba de ltar mdzad cing gnyis
15a3(phal chen): su mi gsung ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dang po'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su
15a4(phal chen): rdzogs par mdzad par rab tu brtson zhing sgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba gcig cig gzigs kyang 'jig
15a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa la thag thogs med pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos
15a6(phal chen): gsum pa'o/ /zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang / dad pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso
15a7(phal chen): bo'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
15b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro snyam du byang chub kyi sems ma nyams pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o/ /
15b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug gi /'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o//
15b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bsngo na/ sangs rgyas kyis spyad pa'i sems su lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis slob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad
15b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o/ /byang chub sems
15b5(phal chen): dpa'i sems rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la dwangs pa/ thams cad du snang zhing kun tu 'od 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams cad du snyoms pas thams cad
15b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad la
15b7(phal chen): ma chags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams cad du mnyam pa nyid kyis 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas te/ sdug bsngal
16a1(phal chen): dang | spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bos chos dgu pa'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi mi bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/ 'gro ba
16a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi don du dka' thub kyis shin tu gdungs kyang bla bar sems bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i sa'i bar
16a3(phal chen): du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
16a4(phal chen): kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te /
16a5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas
16a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
16a7(phal chen): ni| 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
16b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
16b2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang / chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
16b3(phal chen): kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings
16b4(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can ma
16b5(phal chen): lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing / thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul yang chags pa mi mnga' bar
16b6(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku gcig gis kyang tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen por rnam par spyod kyang
16b7(phal chen): chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
17a1(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa bsam gyis mi khyab par ston cing gsung yang / chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
17a2(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17a3(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis
17a4(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam
17a5(phal chen): pa drug cu dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su bzung ba dang / rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam par dag pa
17a6(phal chen): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang / tshig dang / yi ge brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang / bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas seng+ge'i nga ro chen po
17a7(phal chen): sgrogs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen pos bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar gyur pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grags cing bsal te
17b1(phal chen): khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung
17b2(phal chen): gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog
17b3(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing bsgrubs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi la rab tu
17b4(phal chen): rten pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu brnyes pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa/ dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
17b5(phal chen): cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan
17b6(phal chen): mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi dra
17b7(phal chen): ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad mun pa med par ston pa/
18a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye ba dang mi 'brel bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las las phyir mi ldog cing don yod pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pas gnas pa med pa rang
18a2(phal chen): bzhin rnam par dag cing / kun du snyoms par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18a3(phal chen): rnams bzhad mo 'dzum par ston na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma
18a4(phal chen): lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par ston pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa
18a5(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gyur bar lung ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal bar 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhad mo 'dzum pa bstan pa'i rgyan mchog
18a6(phal chen): dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/ bsgribs pa med pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthar
18a7(phal chen): thug pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzi ba med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi de
18b1(phal chen): kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i chos kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral
18b2(phal chen): ba| brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med
18b3(phal chen): pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'od ma 'dres shing rgyan du ma dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs
18b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun du thogs pa med cing thams cad du chags pa med pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa tshad med
18b5(phal chen): pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/ 'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
18b6(phal chen): 'das rnams ni kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ste/ kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /sems can gyi khams ma
18b7(phal chen): lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams gsum du gtogs pa thams cad zil gyis
19a1(phal chen): gnon pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni
19a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
19a3(phal chen): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o/ /chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang / khyad
19a4(phal chen): par med pa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag pas
19a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi mi snyan pa thams cad kyis mi snyan pa brjod du med pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa
19a6(phal chen): bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang / rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste/ shin tu dang ba yongs su rtog pa'i rnyog pa mi mnga' ba sku'i 'phrin
19a7(phal chen): las yongs su gsal ba/ blta bas mi skyo ba/ thugs shin tu rnam par gsal ba/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad skyo ba pa yon gyi gnas kyi dam pa/ bla na med pa
19b1(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na thugs brtse ba can phan par mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes chen po byin gyis brlabs te/ bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa/ 'gro ba
19b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
19b3(phal chen): rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
19b4(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
19b5(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bsgyur bas/ tshig
19b6(phal chen): dang yi ge mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spobs pa mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
19b7(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa dang / smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul
20a1(phal chen): bzhin du 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' bas mnga' che ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' ba sgyur ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20a2(phal chen): rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rnam par bkod pa grangs
20a3(phal chen): med tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsdu
20a4(phal chen): ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsre bas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rab tu bzhag kyang / sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor
20a5(phal chen): zhing rmongs par mi 'gyur la the tshom du mi 'gyur bar mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
20a6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun du byin gyis brlab pa dang / thugs skad
20a7(phal chen): cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par bstan pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par brjod kyang yi ge shin tu bstan pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'jig rten
20b1(phal chen): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / mi mthun pa med cing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'du bar sangs
20b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bzhi
20b3(phal chen): p a'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par skyil mo krung gcig gis
20b4(phal chen): bzhugs na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mi bde ba mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/ gang zag de yang mi bsnyel bas 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba dang / gang zag gcig
20b5(phal chen): l a ji lta ba de bzhin du rim pa rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sku tshe la mnga' bar byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom
20b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams la skyo ba mi mnga' ba ste/ de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim pas/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi don du yongs su skyong ba mdzad pa la
20b7(phal chen): mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
21a1(phal chen): thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa la thag thogs mi mnga' ba dang / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa dang /
21a2(phal chen): phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du thugs skad cig gcig dang
21a3(phal chen): ldan pas bzhud par byin gyis rlob cing chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par bya bas/ chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa rab tu bskor ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni
21a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad
21a5(phal chen): kyi don du thugs skad cig re re la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa gang
21a6(phal chen): yang med la/ gang gis mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med de/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang / slob pa'i sa la gnas shing mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi brjod
21a7(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bsgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis /
21b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o//
21b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi
21b3(phal chen): 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis yongs
21b4(phal chen): su grub par mdzad do/ /ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ni sku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
21b5(phal chen): las gang bsgrub pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams
21b6(phal chen): cad kyi dmigs pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel zhing bsgrub
21b7(phal chen): pas| sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /sangs
22a1(phal chen): r gyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzud par mdzad cing khongs su chud
22a2(phal chen): bar mdzad pa dang / sems can re re zhing yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang / sems can de dag la gnod pa dang / mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba
22a3(phal chen): dang | de dag du yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas bskal pa grangs med pa zad par gnas par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
22a4(phal chen): med par gom pa gcig gis phyin pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas de dag byung ba'i tshe yang brjod du med
22a5(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga de nas
22a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
22a7(phal chen): med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bstan pa gcig nas
22b1(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
22b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa dang / da ltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa yongs su brjod par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa kun tu mtshams med par
22b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po bgegs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
22b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad+mo'i rgyan chen
22b5(phal chen): p os brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
22b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
22b7(phal chen): sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma re re'i byin gyis rlabs kyis brlabs pa dang / dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig thams
23a1(phal chen): cad la'ang pad+mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
23a2(phal chen): b rjod du med pa rnam par dag pa rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa
23a3(phal chen): mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med cing 'byams klas pa dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/ blo tshad med pa dang / mos pa shin tu
23a4(phal chen): yangs pa dang ldan pa/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa skad cig
23a5(phal chen): ma gcig gis thams cad yongs su bstan kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du sgrub pa mi mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
23a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur
23a7(phal chen): ba'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/
23b1(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
23b2(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su
23b3(phal chen): rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs
23b4(phal chen): pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
23b5(phal chen): rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
23b6(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs
23b7(phal chen): su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs kyi sku blta na don yod par yongs su rdzogs pas
24a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas
24a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//
24a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
24a4(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa
24a5(phal chen): med cing spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/ dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
24a6(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do/ /ma
24a7(phal chen): bcings ma gol ba dang / gzung ba med cing bsags pa med de/ yongs su rdzogs pa med par yang thugs su chud la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa yang brnyes te/
24b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba de yang yang dag pa de kho na nyid ma nor ba rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad bdag gi med cing yongs
24b2(phal chen): su 'dzin pa med la de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par mi 'da' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang ba la'ang rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/
24b3(phal chen): /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/ mtshan ma
24b4(phal chen): thams cad dang mi 'grogs shing / mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul thams
24b5(phal chen): cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang / zhing gi mtshan ma dang / rnam par spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs
24b6(phal chen): yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas mun pa med pa'i snang ba ston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
24b7(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gsum pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/
25a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pas/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang
25a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas pa skye ba yang rab tu brjod
25a3(phal chen): cing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
25a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i 'phrin las dang / gsung gi 'phrin las dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga' la yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs
25a5(phal chen): shing rnam par phye ba med pa'i mthar thug pa ste/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin la bgrang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul grangs med pa'i mdzod du gyur
25a6(phal chen): cing | bgrang ba dang mngon par sgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud pa ye shes bsgrigs
25a7(phal chen): pa med pas gzigs pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmigs pa la rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs tshad med mu med par mngon
25b1(phal chen): par sgrub pa mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga pa'o/ /chos thams cad lta ba med pas tha mi dad pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / 'byung ba med
25b2(phal chen): pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / sna tshogs med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges par yang dag par sgrub cing
25b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa yang yang dag par gzigs pas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par
25b4(phal chen): gzigs pas chos la mnga' bsgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs
25b5(phal chen): mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan dang gzhan mkhyen par bya ba/ chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa
25b6(phal chen): gnas pa med pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi chos skyon med pas dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen te/ de la yang nyi ma gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ lo gcig
25b7(phal chen): gam/ lo brgya'am/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang / 'du bas rjes su bsnyag pa dang / phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gcig gi dus dang / snga
26a1(phal chen): dro nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / phyi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang / nyi ma gung nas phyi dro'i dus dang / nyi ma 'grangs pa'i dus dang / nyi ma bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus
26a2(phal chen): dang | zla ba dang / lo dang / lo brgya'i dus dang / bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus su chos
26a3(phal chen): bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog /rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ bral bar mi 'gyur/ bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/
26a4(phal chen): g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ ring du mi 'gyur/ 'khor de na gnas pa nyid du yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun
26a5(phal chen): pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rtag tu dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs
26a6(phal chen): pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa grangs med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen
26a7(phal chen): pa zad mi shes pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i
26b1(phal chen): tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mthar thug pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang
26b2(phal chen): dag par mkhyen pa tshig gi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o/ /chos thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o/ /bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba
26b3(phal chen): bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang / rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin dus mtshams med par ston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod pa med pa rnams mdo
26b4(phal chen): sde de dang de la thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /sangs
26b5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang / ming dang rigs su byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang / yi ges shin tu dbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste/ ming 'das pa
26b6(phal chen): ma yin pa dang / ming ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang / ming da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang / ming sems can ma yin pa dang / ming zhing ma yin pa dang / ming chos ma yin pa dang / ming yon
26b7(phal chen): tan ma yin pa dang / ming byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / ming sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ming grangs ma yin pa dang / ming grangs med pa ma yin pa dang / ming skye ba ma yin pa
27a1(phal chen): dang | ming 'gag pa ma yin pa dang / ming med pa ma yin pa dang / ming yod pa ma yin pa dang / ming gcig pa ma yin pa dang / ming tha dad pa ma yin pa
27a2(phal chen): dang | ming thams cad ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / brda med pa dang / tshig gi lam med pa dang / sgra dang bral
27a3(phal chen): ba| sgra'i rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba yongs su bsgrubs pa med pa/ byas pa dang rnam par byas pa med pa/ rnam pa gcig ma yin pa/ rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs
27a4(phal chen): su chud la brjod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa dag ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i yul mi mnga' ba dag go /mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa
27a5(phal chen): la rab tu brtson pa dag go / rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa 'gag pa dag go /spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
27a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ tshor
27a7(phal chen): ba'i spros pa med pa dang / 'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang / 'du byed kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu
27b1(phal chen): mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyud med pa dang / khams rnams mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / chos thams cad bskyod du med cing rang bzhin gyis
27b2(phal chen): nam mkha' lta bu dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / las med pa dang / rnam par smin pa med pa dang / spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang / ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang / grangs kyis mi
27b3(phal chen): brjod pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / skyon med pa
27b4(phal chen): dang | gnas med pa dang / yongs su gnas pa med pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa med pa dang / rnam par btul ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can med pa ma yin
27b5(phal chen): pa dang / srog med pa dang / srog med pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / rten pa med pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang
27b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa brnyes pa dag ste/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam par dgod pa
27b7(phal chen): rnams la stobs bcus thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas
28a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
28a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi
28a3(phal chen): khyab pa rnams te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang
28a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi
28a5(phal chen): khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ kha dog tshad med pa /
28a6(phal chen): gzi brjid tshad med pa/ snang ba tshad med pa/ dbyangs tshad med pa/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa/ gsung brjod pas rnam par dmigs pa tshad med pa/
28a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la spyod pa/ shes rab dang / ye shes yul tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ bdud dang bcas
28b1(phal chen): pa| tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /byams pa chen po'i spyod yul thogs
28b2(phal chen): pa med pa dang / thabs thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i mthar thug pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po rnam
28b3(phal chen): par sbyang ba dang / cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs
28b4(phal chen): pa mdzad do/ /theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad do/ /'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs
28b5(phal chen): pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dang po'o/ /dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa med kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing / byang chub
28b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i sku tha ma skye bar bstan pa/ sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa/ mig yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pa/ nam mkha'i yul
28b7(phal chen): tshad med par khyab pa/ bzhed pa bzhin du skye yang chags pa mi mnga' ba/ smig rgyu ba lta bur bstan pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba/ gnas med pa'i
29a1(phal chen): ye shes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa/ rgyan shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /
29a2(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po ldan pa na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
29a3(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad do/ /yid la bya ba byin gyi rlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
29a4(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad do/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /yum sku skyed pa'i sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad
29a5(phal chen): do| |sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen po brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin du brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
29a6(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dang de
29a7(phal chen): dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du thog ma dang / dbus dang / tha ma'i tshul
29b1(phal chen): gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sa 'di la gnyis su med pa thams cad mthar phyin par byas nas tha mar 'jig rten gyi grangs kyis skye ba yongs su ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig
29b2(phal chen): rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang
29b3(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig
29b4(phal chen): rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis
29b5(phal chen): kyang 'jig rten sna tshogs/ 'jig rten tshad med pa/ 'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang / rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
29b6(phal chen): las mdzad do/ /zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sems
29b7(phal chen): can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sprul pa chen
30a1(phal chen): po'i rgyud dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
30a2(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gnyis pa'o/ /dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing / gdung rabs thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag pas sku tshe'i rgyud kyi
30a3(phal chen): tshul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad gdul ba thugs su chud pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa ston kyang /
30a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyi gnas la bzhugs pa rnams sgra dang / tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtags pas dngos po thams cad dngos po med
30a5(phal chen): pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang / tshul khrims thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs
30a6(phal chen): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos 'gro ba mu med pa la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtog par bya ba dang / dga' ba
30a7(phal chen): chen pos 'jig rten brjod du med par khong du chud par bya ba dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang sgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis
30b1(phal chen): rang yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed par bya
30b2(phal chen): ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan du byed par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa rnam par brjod pa rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang /
30b3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la rtog par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bar rnam par smin pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems can gdul ba dang /
30b4(phal chen): yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su smin pa rnams tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang / grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs
30b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par sbyang ba dang / thugs
30b6(phal chen): rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis mngon par spang ba dang / thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen po bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su brlan pa dang / sangs rgyas
30b7(phal chen): thams cad mthong ba dang / rnam par dmigs pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bstan pa yan chad du 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yongs su bstan pa
31a1(phal chen): mdzad cing / ye shes kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa bsgribs pa med par bsgrubs pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyis
31a2(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' dang / sku'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gsung gi 'phrin las ye shes nyams pa med pas rnam par dag
31a3(phal chen): pa dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
31a4(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gsum pa'o/ / //bam po drug cu lnga pa/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgyan rnam par skye ba
31a5(phal chen): tshad med pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas las bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
31a6(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten du gtogs pa thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang
31a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su bcad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang zhing nub pa la yang dag par spyod par bya ba dang / sems can gyi don rjes su dran
31b1(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang / khyim pa'i tshul yongs su spang ba bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba
31b2(phal chen): dang | sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po brnyes pas sems can rnams
31b3(phal chen): kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu bsal ba dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med par gyur par 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyed
31b4(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par brjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag
31b5(phal chen): pa'i sgor brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal
31b6(phal chen): mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba mdzad cing mngon par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bzhi pa'o/ /don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa
31b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni/ chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
32a1(phal chen): rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba'i
