32a2(phal chen): p hyir| byin gyi rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu brnyes pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don
32a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam par bkram pas yongs su rgyas pa/
32a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dam pa thob pa rnams kyis zhal du blta ba/ byang chub sems
32a5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
32a6(phal chen): zab mo rab tu bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa brtsams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs
32a7(phal chen): spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du
32b1(phal chen): rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha'
32b2(phal chen): yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes nas bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa thams
32b3(phal chen): cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi
32b4(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad dang / 'dul ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus par mthar thug pa rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du
32b5(phal chen): mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
32b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis
32b7(phal chen): tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang / mi 'jigs pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i
33a1(phal chen): sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa
33a2(phal chen): med pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi
33a3(phal chen): mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod
33a4(phal chen): pa'i 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la sogs pa rnam
33a5(phal chen): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
33a6(phal chen): bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
33a7(phal chen): las drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su gshegs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
33b1(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang /
33b2(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gnas dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i gnas
33b3(phal chen): dang | sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ grong khyer gyi khrod byon na/ sa
33b4(phal chen): g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / long ba rnams mig 'thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / smyos pa rnams dran pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gos med pa
33b5(phal chen): rnams gos 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba 'thob pa dang / rol mo'i cha spyad ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra yid du 'ong ba rang 'byin pa dang / rgyan snod na 'dug
33b6(phal chen): pa dang / gnas nas ma phog pa dang / ma bskyod ma dkrol bar bskyod cing dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang / blta na gtang mi bra
33b7(phal chen): zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bstan
34a1(phal chen): pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ yongs su gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs
34a2(phal chen): pa dang / brkyang ba dang bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /gshegs pa dang / slar bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang /
34a3(phal chen): bzhugs pa dang / gzims pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa dang / mi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang sems can rnams la
34a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
34a5(phal chen): rnams 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen
34a6(phal chen): pos shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
34a7(phal chen): las mdzad do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gzugs blta na mi ngoms pa'o zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye bar dkon no zhes bya bar
34b1(phal chen): yid ches par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa ni bsod nams kyi chos dkar po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi
34b2(phal chen): spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa ni
34b3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par sgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mos pa'i tshul
34b4(phal chen): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o zhes khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin
34b5(phal chen): gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gyur bar sems pa dang /
34b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhing thams cad na snang bar khong du chud pa dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas/ 'jig rten thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
34b7(phal chen): rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /dad par byas pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba byas pa dang / rjes su bstod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang /
35a1(phal chen): mchod pa dang / mngon du mthong ba dang / 'dzum pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo nas kyang
35a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35a3(phal chen): rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod par bya bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la
35a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa tshad med pa bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can
35a5(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos par bya bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
35a6(phal chen): 'phrin las mdzad de/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag 'jig
35a7(phal chen): rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mthu dang 'dul ba ji lta ba'i tshul las mi 'da' bar 'byung ngo / /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
35b1(phal chen): las 'jig rten thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa la gnas pa dge ba rgya che ba tshad med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i yul dang / snying rje chen pos rab tu
35b2(phal chen): bskul ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs
35b3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgon pa la bzhugs sam/ zhi bar bzhugs sam/ dben par bzhugs
35b4(phal chen): sam| sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs sam/ /ting nge 'dzin chen po'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ gcig pu dgyes par bzhugs sam/ sku mi snang bar bzhugs sam/ ye
35b5(phal chen): shes zab mo'i gnas la bzhugs sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs tshad med pa la bzhugs sam/ sku'i yongs su spyod pa mi mthong bar bzhugs kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
35b6(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis mos pa bzhin du 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyun mi 'chad
35b7(phal chen): par 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas lha yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad
36a1(phal chen): do| |sangs rgyas gnod sbyin yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs
36a2(phal chen): rgyas srin po yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas byang chub
36a3(phal chen): sems dpa' yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas gcig brjod pas
36a4(phal chen): kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par
36a5(phal chen): dang / smon lam thams cad gcig tu brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcig rnam par phye ste/ spyod pa tha dad pa brjod
36a6(phal chen): pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /'jig rten gyi yul sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
36a7(phal chen): yul 'jig rten gyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /yul ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yul du brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun
36b1(phal chen): mi 'chad do/ /nyin mtshan dang / yud du yan man dang / zla ba dang / lo 'grangs par bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pa nas de bzhin du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
36b2(phal chen): med pa'i bar du bzhugs pa dang / yongs su bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
36b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brgyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'byung gnas lta bu sems can thams cad kyi
36b4(phal chen): bsam pa kun la rnam par sbyong ba lta bu/ sangs rgyas rnams la dad pa lta bu/ sems khong du chud par bya ba la shin tu mos pa lta bu/ dbang po rnams la sgrub pa lta bu/ sems
36b5(phal chen): can skye dgu thams cad la 'dul ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad la mos pa lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba lta bu/ byang chub tu zhugs pa rnams la bskul
36b6(phal chen): ba lta bu/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba lta bu dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten mi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
36b7(phal chen): las rgyun mi 'chad par brjod pa dang / 'phrin las mdzad pa'i mthar thug par bstan pa dang / chos kyi rgyud nyams pa med pa'i dngos por brjod pa dang / srid pa'i tshul rtsa ba nas chad
37a1(phal chen): par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad skyo bar bya bar bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems su mthun par bya ba dang / sku tshe'i mtha' lta
37a2(phal chen): bur sems can rnams kyis shes par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad du dga' bar bya ba med par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams la ma byon pa'i
37a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mnyes par gyis shig par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan tu mi rung bar khong du
37a4(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi rtsol ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa'i sems la dgod pa dang / yun du dran pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin
37a5(phal chen): gshegs pa mthong ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa dang / skyo ba'i dbang po phyir bzlog cing / yongs su dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyo bar gyur
37a6(phal chen): ba'i sems can rnams la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i rkyen 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyin par dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /
37a7(phal chen): sku thams cad bshig ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / dregs shing
37b1(phal chen): myos pa'i sems can rnams sdom pa la dgod pa mdzad cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
37b2(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dgu pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe| 'jig rten thams cad na sems can rnams smre sngags 'don cing ngu ba dang
37b3(phal chen): mya ngan byed pa dang / mchi ma 'byin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhe'am/ thugs rje chen po zhe'am/ ded dpon chen po zhe'am/ phan par bzhed pa thugs brtse ba
37b4(phal chen): can zhe'am/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/ mgon du gyur pa/ rten du gyur pa/ bla na med pa bsod nams kyi zhing nub par gyur to/ /
37b5(phal chen): zhe'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes rnam pa de lta bur smre sngags 'don pa dang / mya ngan byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems
37b6(phal chen): can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / yid la bya ba de dang de dag gi sgor sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa rgyun mi 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan
37b7(phal chen): las 'da' ba'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi sems dad par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams dad pas mchod par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams lhag
38a1(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong bar bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya
38a2(phal chen): ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin
38a3(phal chen): gshegs pa la mchod pas dmigs par bya ba'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pas/ phyogs dang yul sna tshogs su sems can rnams
38a4(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par bya ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ lha dang / klu dang /
38a5(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas thams cad du 'dul pa dang / mos pa'i tshul ji
38a6(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang / ring bsrel byin gyis rlob bo/ /rang gi sku rnam par phye ste/ sku gdung dang ring bsrel tshad med pa grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis
38a7(phal chen): mi khyab pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa byin gyis rlob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba
38b1(phal chen): de'i yul dang / phyogs kyi klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas pa dang / srin
38b2(phal chen): po'i gnas dag tu sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod par byed par 'gyur bas/ sku gdung gi ring bsrel dang / dbu dang phyag sen gyi mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i mchod rten
38b3(phal chen): la 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te/ chos la rab tu rten par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun la dad pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /yul dang phyogs kyi gnas de dang de dag
38b4(phal chen): tu 'ang rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams byed par 'gyur ro/ /mtho ris de dang de yongs su dag pa rab
38b5(phal chen): tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs dang rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod chen po dang 'khor rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi'i phun
38b6(phal chen): sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /log par ltung ba med pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba don yod pa rab tu sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /chos dkar
38b7(phal chen): po la gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i lam yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa gang la dad pa'i smon lam gyis nges par 'byung /
39a1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag la drin du gzo ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la brten pa dang /
39a2(phal chen): skyabs btsal ba dang / mgon btsal ba dang / dpung gnyen btsal ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das
39a3(phal chen): kyang yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa sbyong ba/ bsod nams zad mi shes pa'i yon gyi gnas dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten du byung na/ de ltar sems can
39a4(phal chen): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa mang po rab tu bsags pas bsod nams kyi tshogs rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
39a5(phal chen): 'phrin las bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
39a6(phal chen): rnams so/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ched gzung bar mi nus pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
39a7(phal chen): byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su
39b1(phal chen): med par spyod cing / dngos po rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug gi chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ lung bstan pa
39b2(phal chen): thams cad ston pa la gnyis su med par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa la brtson pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa brjod
39b3(phal chen): du med pa 'byams klas pa rnams la gnyis su med par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pas gnyis su med pa'i sku rnam par dmigs
39b4(phal chen): par mdzad do/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rang bzhin gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'byung ba dang /
39b5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i mtha' gnyis su med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi
39b6(phal chen): zhing thams cad gnyis su med pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gcig par rab tu mkhyen cing ston pa thugs su chud par mnga' ba'o/ /sangs rgyas gcig dang /
39b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs su chud pa dang / 'dul ba mdzad pa'i rnam par
40a1(phal chen): dmigs pa gnyis su med par thugs su chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gnyis su med par thugs su
40a2(phal chen): chud pa mnga' ba'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig ste/ gnyis su med par thugs
40a3(phal chen): su chud par mnga' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med par spyod cing / dngos po gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi
40a4(phal chen): dbang phyug gi chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa chos thams cad la rab tu
40a5(phal chen): bzhugs pa rnams so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
40a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po mi nyams pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /
40a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su mi gtong ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po med pa la gnas
40b1(phal chen): pa'i chos nyid la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skal ba mnyam pa tha mi dad cing don yod pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
40b2(phal chen): 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad nyams pa med par gzhol bar la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs
40b3(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis rnam par spyod pa la bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug
40b4(phal chen): pas grub pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la bzhugs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
40b5(phal chen): bzhugs pa chos thams cad la bzhugs pa rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par
40b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa 'grangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa 'grangs
40b7(phal chen): pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'grangs pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / tshig gi lam mtha' dag thams cad mngon par
41a1(phal chen): mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / shes pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon
41a2(phal chen): par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la
41a3(phal chen): bsam pa tshad med pa yongs su mi btang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'bar bar bya ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos
41a4(phal chen): thams cad 'tshang rgya ba'i mkhyen pa mtha' dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtha' dag thams
41a5(phal chen): cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi mig 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta bur dbye ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas
41a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ / //bam po drug cu rtsa drug pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs
41a7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po/ stobs dam pa/ stobs tshad med pa/ stobs bdag nyi che ba/ stobs thub pa med pa/ stobs mi mnyam pa/ stobs snying po dang
41b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ stobs mi shigs pa/ stobs 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ stobs sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan stobs po che
41b2(phal chen): dpa' bo chen po'i stobs rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis mi shigs mi chod pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyis
41b3(phal chen): sku tshe'i dbang po nyams par mi nus pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa'i me'i gdung bas 'tshig par mi nus pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig par gtogs
41b4(phal chen): pa'i chu'i phung por 'grongs par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi dpung dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
41b5(phal chen): dang | nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi dpung dang / sha za dang / srin po thams cad kyi dpung dang / sems can ma lus pa
41b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' ba'o/ /rdo rje ri rab kyi ri tsam gyi char pa dang / khor yug gi ri chen po tsam dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi rdo rje'i char bab kyang / bcom
41b7(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu gcig kyang 'gul bar mi 'gyur/ g.yo bar mi 'gyur te/ bag tsha ba'i shas mi mnga'
42a1(phal chen): ba'o| |bzhugs sam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhud dam/ gzims kyang rung ste/ spyod lam 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs
42a2(phal chen): ba'i yul de dang / de'i 'khor dag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes na kun tu 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs
42a3(phal chen): rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing mi g.yo na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
42a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dang po'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgyes na/ chos kyi dbyings
42a5(phal chen): thams cad kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ri rab kyi ri dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang ri dang nags tshal thibs
42a6(phal chen): po dang / sems can gnas pa'i gnas tha dad pa kun dang bcas pa/ de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu btsud de/ phyi ma'i
42a7(phal chen): mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyis shes par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de
42b1(phal chen): dag ni de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sku'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig gis bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bsnams shing / gshegs sam/ bzhugs sam/ bzhengs
42b2(phal chen): sam/ gzims kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs skad cig tsam yang skyo ba mnga'o/ /chad cing dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang stobs la yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba
42b3(phal chen): mi mnga'o/ /spyod lam rnam par 'gyur ba mi mnga'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin kyang
42b4(phal chen): skyo ba med do/ /dub pa med do/ /gnod pa med do/ /med par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi g.yo/ mi 'byung / mi 'jig go/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ba spu'i khung bu
42b5(phal chen): gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bsnams kyang / de'i rgyus thugs skad cig tsam du yang mi bde ba'i sku nyams mi 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
42b6(phal chen): rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gshegs stabs gcig tu bzhud
42b7(phal chen): p as sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'da' zhing thugs bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa tha dad pa'i
43a1(phal chen): rim pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung bar mdzad do/ /de lta bur gshegs pas bskal pa 'jig
43a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gshegs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud ji snyed pa'i bskal par bzhud de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
43a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du 'khor kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i khor yug chen po'i rdo rje'i ri dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam pa brjod du
43a4(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa snyed kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang de la bsgres pa de snyed ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu btsud de/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin du sku'i
43a5(phal chen): ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du btsud de/ ba spu'i khung bu yang sems can thams cad snyed du gyur la de dag thams cad bsnams te/ de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung bur tshul de bzhin du bshams
43a6(phal chen): te| thugs bskyed pa de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ nam
43a7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rgyu zhing gshegs sam/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'grangs pa sngon gyi mthar gtogs pa nas bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug
43b1(phal chen): par de bzhin du gshegs pas bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa la brtson pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sku nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /thugs
43b2(phal chen): rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
43b3(phal chen): mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms gcig bzhes nas bskal
43b4(phal chen): pa brjod du med par skyil mo krung gcig bcas pas nyin mtshan gyi rgyud du sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur gtogs pa'i bskal pa 'das par bzhugs kyang sku mi g.yo
43b5(phal chen): zhing bde ba'i dam pa la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par spyod kyang sems can 'ga' tsam la'ang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
43b6(phal chen): las rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su bkod do/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can
43b7(phal chen): gcig gi lus kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tsam du che ba de lta bur gyur la/ sems can gcig
44a1(phal chen): gi lus kyi tshad ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lus su sems can thams cad kyang gyur la/ sems can de dag re re'i gzugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
44a2(phal chen): cad kyi lcid ji tsam yod pa de tsam du gyur te/ sems can gcig ji ltar lci ba bzhin du sems can thams cad re re'i lcid kyang de tsam du 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad de
44a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par bsnams te/ phyag sor gyi rtse mo gcig gis ji ltar bsnams pa de bzhin du phyag
44a4(phal chen): sor thams cad kyi rtse mo la'ang de tsam re re bsnams kyang / de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sku mnyel ba'am/ thugs dub par mi 'gyur te/ thugs bskyed pa'i cha shas
44a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal mi bde ba skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa dang / phyogs
44a6(phal chen): kyi dra ba'i rnam pa la 'jug pa re re dang / de lta bu la 'jug pa/ nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa'i dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i
44a7(phal chen): cha shas kyis gzhal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa thams cad re re zhing yang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis gzhal te/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi kun tu khyab pa thams cad ma
44b1(phal chen): lus pa'i skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa thams cad du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam 'di'i tshul dang / skyil mo krung gcig tu bzhugs
44b2(phal chen): pa'i spyod pas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad par mdzad de/ bskal pa 'da' bar mdzad cing bskal pa la rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
44b3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig la dbu sangs
44b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byin gyis brlabs te/ dbu re re la ljags sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
44b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byin gyis brlabs nas/ de dag re res kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
44b6(phal chen): ba snyed re re brjod de/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung re res kyang mdo sde sangs rgyas
44b7(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bshad la/ mdo sde re re la yang chos bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
45a1(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa gcig las kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
45a2(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed brjod par gyur la/ chos bstan pa gcig las ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa thams cad las kyang de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi
45a3(phal chen): ge brjod de/ de ltar brjod pas bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu bstan la/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
45a4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par gyur kyang / da dung gzhan yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
45a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du brgyud cing rab tu ston pa'i tshul gyi rnam grangs 'dis bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu bstan la/ rnam
45a6(phal chen): g rangs 'di 'dra bas bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa 'das par gyur
45a7(phal chen): te| phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa zad cing 'das par byas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa chos thams cad snang ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad
45b1(phal chen): rab tu shes par bstan cing lung bstan pa dang / the tshom thams cad rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
45b2(phal chen): dang | byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad brjod pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i chos
45b3(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi sgron ma chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa dang / mi
45b4(phal chen): 'jigs pa chen pos brgyan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad de/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin chen po
45b5(phal chen): dpe thams cad la dpe med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis
45b6(phal chen): gzhal ba ma lus pa thams cad chags pa med par rnam par dbye bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa de snyed de snyed du thugs
45b7(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par sprul pa mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re la'ang de
46a1(phal chen): snyed de snyed kyi dbu mnga' bar gyur la/ gzhung de bzhin du sku re re la'ang de snyed de snyed kyi ljags mnga' bar gyur te/ ljags re re las kyang de snyed de snyed
46a2(phal chen): kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi gsung chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad pa byung la/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad kyi
46a3(phal chen): gsung de dag re res kyang de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde bshad par gyur la/ mdo sde de dag re re la yang de snyed de snyed kyi chos bstan pa la rab tu gzhol ba mdzad de/ chos bstan pa
46a4(phal chen): de dag re re las kyang de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge brjod par gyur la/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge de dag re res kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dbyangs
46a5(phal chen): kyi rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad go bar mdzad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la dub ba mi mnga' ste/ nyams par mi 'gyur la
46a6(phal chen): thogs pa mi mnga' zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di
46a7(phal chen): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
46b1(phal chen): ni thugs dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa rdo rje chen po ltar shin tu bstan par grub pa mnga' ba dag ste/ de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du byon na bdud sdig to can gyi sems can thams cad snyed
46b2(phal chen): kyi bdud kyi sde gzugs sna tshogs can shin tu mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa rab tu sdang ba'i gzugs can/ 'jig rten thams cad shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/
46b3(phal chen): rab tu skyi g.ya' ba skyed pa'i gzugs can/ bdud shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ rab mchog por 'jigs pa 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad gsod pa/ 'jig
46b4(phal chen): rten thams cad phung bar byed pa/ de lta bu sha stag gis byang chub kyi shing drung dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par gang bar gzigs kyang
46b5(phal chen): byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyengs pa mi mnga'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga'o/ /ba spu gcig kyang g.yo ba med do/ /thugs kyi cha shas
46b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba 'ga' tsam gyis kyang de ltar rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzugs la mtshan ma rnam pa tha dad pa 'dzin pa mi mnga' ste/ shin tu brtan no/ /g.yo ba med do/ /mi sgul to/ /
46b7(phal chen): 'gyur pa med do/ /rnam par rtog pa med do/ /shin tu zhi ba'o/ /bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo/ /sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu spangs so/ /sangs
47a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad do/ /byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis dbang po shin tu dben pa'o/ /bag tsha ba
47a2(phal chen): mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o/ /thugs shin tu brten zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /tshur zil gyis mi gnon la phar zil gyis gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/
47a3(phal chen): bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to/ /shin tu spa gong ngo / /de ltar zil gyis
47a4(phal chen): mnan te spa gong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo/ /de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
47a5(phal chen): 'dul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrub ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
47a6(phal chen): mthu bo che chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pa ni/
47a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang de dag thams cad du sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyis rnam par dmigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
47b1(phal chen): pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med do/ /ri rab la thogs pa med do/ /rin po che'i ri la thogs pa med do/ /khor yug dang khor yug chen po la thogs pa med do/ /lha'i khyim la thogs pa
47b2(phal chen): med do/ /klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do/ /dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do/ /nam mkha' lding gi
47b3(phal chen): khyim la thogs pa med do/ /mi'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /lto 'phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa med do/ /gal te brgya la
47b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste/ ca co 'dres par gyur kyang de la de bzhin gshegs
47b5(phal chen): pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' zhig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par
47b6(phal chen): dmigs pa la lhang nge lham me lhan ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyang rlag par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che
47b7(phal chen): chen po'i stobs/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste/
48a1(phal chen): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
48a2(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyan gcig tu gyur pa'o/ /rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang ste shin tu gsal ba'o/ /bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o/ /chos thams cad
48a3(phal chen): la mi gnas pa'o/ /nang na gnas pa ma yin pa'o/ /phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o/ /ma skyes pa'o/ /dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /zhi zhing gnas pa med pa'o/ /
48a4(phal chen): rtsom pa med pa'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/ /dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o/ /
48a5(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'o/ /dmigs pa dang / yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o/ /chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'
48a6(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'du shes kyi rnam pa thams
48a7(phal chen): cad kyi tshad dang tshad med pa dang bral ba'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul
48b1(phal chen): lo| |mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /stobs bcu'i rgyan du gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /thabs mkhas
48b2(phal chen): pas byung ba'o/ /chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'o/ /dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos
48b3(phal chen): gzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis pa'o/ /chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul thams cad la dgongs
48b4(phal chen): pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o/ /zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi g.yo
48b5(phal chen): la| nyams pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/ zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi
48b6(phal chen): mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pas klas pa/ chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag
48b7(phal chen): pa| dus gsum thams cad kyi bsgrub pa med par 'byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen
49a1(phal chen): pa ste| 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan
49a2(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mi mnga' ba ste/ rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o/ /mtha' dang
49a3(phal chen): dbus med par yongs su grub pa'i sku'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o/ /khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o/ /brten pa'i skus rnam par
49a4(phal chen): dmigs pa'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku'i rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa'o/ /bden pa med pa dang / rdzun pa med pa'i sku mnyam
49a5(phal chen): pa nyid kyi yongs su dag pa'o/ /chos kyi sku bzhud pa dang / byon pa med pa'i sku'o/ /'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o/ /mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig
49a6(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no/ /yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o/ /ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung
49a7(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no/ /lus thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i
49b1(phal chen): tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no/ /sku yongs kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sku'o/ /khams gsum
49b2(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no/ /mi g.yo mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o/ /yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul
49b3(phal chen): dang tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o/ /sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gyur pa'i sku'o/ /'gags pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gags pa yang ma yin pas
49b4(phal chen): 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o/ /yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o/ /chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par
49b5(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i sku'o/ /rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o/ /thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sku'o/ /thams cad kyi
49b6(phal chen): rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing / 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o/ /phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
49b7(phal chen): par thar pas ye shes thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i
50a1(phal chen): stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu po'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang
50a2(phal chen): mnyam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o/ /mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par
50a3(phal chen): du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /
50a4(phal chen): tha dad pa med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis bzung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams
50a5(phal chen): cad thugs su chud pa'o/ /smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog pa'o/ /spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /spyod pa'i stobs
50a6(phal chen): la thub par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o/ /spyod pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par spyad pas rgyud
50a7(phal chen): dma' ba med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med bar spyod pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o/ /lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma
50b1(phal chen): yin pa'o/ /lam gyi yul med pa'o/ /lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o/ /ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o/ /bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas chos kyi char 'bebs
50b2(phal chen): pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba dris pa dang ma dris pa la rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o/ /mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o/ /sku dang / thugs
50b3(phal chen): dang | gsung gi yang dag par spyod pa rnams la 'phrin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pas brnyes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas brnyes pa'o/ /de
50b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mdzad pa thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi bstan pa tshad med pa'i gnas
50b5(phal chen): rtsa ba med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thams cad kyis mthar thug par mi 'gyur pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi sems kyis spyod pa'i shes pa thams cad kyis bsam gyis
50b6(phal chen): mi khyab pa'o/ /chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o/ /dus gsum yangs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba mtha' dang dbus
50b7(phal chen): med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir phra ba'i ye shes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/
51a1(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad du sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku 'grangs pa thams cad
51a2(phal chen): thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyis yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o/ /yi ge sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pas brjod du med
51a3(phal chen): pa thugs su chud pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ /dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi
51a4(phal chen): lus dang / skye mched ji lta bar thugs skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong du chud par ston pa mkhyen pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi don du chos yongs su
51a5(phal chen): btang zhing rim gror bya bas thugs su chud pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad yul du gyur pa'o/ /
51a6(phal chen): dus gsum thams cad la thugs skad cig gis chags pa med par mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung
51a7(phal chen): ba ma lus par yul du gyur pa'o/ /'jig pa med par 'dul ba thams cad yul du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rnam par dag pa'i yul thams cad mngon par
51b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas pa'o/ /sa mtshams med cing thug pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus
51b2(phal chen): gsum du brjod pa ma lus pa thams cad thugs skad cig gis mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o/ /sems can gyi rnam pa thams cad las mtshams ma bcad pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi
51b3(phal chen): khams kyi rnam pa thams cad la mu med pa'o/ /dus gsum gyi rnam par thams cad la mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rnam pa thams cad la tshad med pa'i
51b4(phal chen): shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad la lhag ma ma lus pa ste/ de dag thams cad lhag ma med par mngon par sangs rgyas pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
51b5(phal chen): par 'phrul pas byung ba thams cad thugs su chud pa dang / mkhyen pa thams cad rgyun chad pa med de/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu
51b6(phal chen): phyung ba'i skus mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ chags pa med pa'i thugs kyis spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin/ thugs rje chen po'i sbyor bas dus thams
51b7(phal chen): cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bstan pa la spyod pas mtha' dang dbus med par spyod pa yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu bo che chen po'i
52a1(phal chen): stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo
52a2(phal chen): che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos rnams te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang /
52a3(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa nus pa dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs
52a4(phal chen): pa mi mnga' ba rnams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dga' ldan gyi tshe ji srid par bzhugs nas/ 'pho ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
52a5(phal chen): 'das rnams ni/ zla ba bcus bltams pa bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mngon par 'byung bar dgyes pa'i thugs kyi mngon
52a6(phal chen): par 'byung ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang
52a7(phal chen): rgya ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
52b1(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dus bzhin du 'dul ba
52b2(phal chen): rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa'i tshul bzhin du dus la bab par bshad
52b3(phal chen): cing lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dus la bab pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /
52b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa rnams lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ skad
52b5(phal chen): cig gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi dri ba yongs su dris pa skad cig gcig gis lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ste/ kye| rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas
52b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur
52b7(phal chen): du 'byung ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du ngan song dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
53a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom
53a2(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu
53a3(phal chen): sems can rnams myur du mtho ris su skye ba yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du yid
53a4(phal chen): gnyis dang / nem nur yang dag par bsal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du byang chub kyi sems
53a5(phal chen): bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ sems can mos pa yangs pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba las byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams kyang bla na
53a6(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ mthong ma thag tu skyon med par ma 'das pa dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyi sems can
53a7(phal chen): rnams myur du skyon med pa 'da' ba'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
53b1(phal chen): 'das pa'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du bsgribs pa thams cad byang ba 'thob par 'gyur
53b2(phal chen): ro| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams myur du snang ba 'thob cing mi 'jigs pa zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa rab tu rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
53b3(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu myur du 'byung ba'i chos rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs
53b4(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sngon gyi sbyor bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
53b5(phal chen): kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ spyod pa rnam par dag pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas
53b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ smon
53b7(phal chen): lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yang dag par bsgrubs pas kyang
54a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi tshangs par spyod pa
54a2(phal chen): la spyad pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems
54a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzugs kyi sku tshad med mu med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su
54a4(phal chen): dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med mu med pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes
54a5(phal chen): su dran par bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dran par bya ba yin te/
54a6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
54a7(phal chen): pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna
54b1(phal chen): tshogs dang / sems du ma dang / spyod pa dang / g.yo ba'i rgyud thams cad ma lus par thugs gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi las dang /
54b2(phal chen): las kun nas blangs pa sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu rnam pa tha dad pas mngon par 'gro zhing nye bar gsog pa mang nyung dang / rnam par smin pa tha dad pa ma lus par thugs gcig gis thugs
54b3(phal chen): su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can gyi rigs sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi rigs du ma'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dus ji bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i cho
54b4(phal chen): 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad
54b5(phal chen): dang | phyogs dra ba'i rgyud thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtshan ma bzung ste/ sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / skye ba dang / rnam
54b6(phal chen): par dbye ba ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du
54b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med par skad cig tu/ sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
55a1(phal chen): khams thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi
55a2(phal chen): dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
55a3(phal chen): 'byung ba bstan pa ma lus par thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dang der 'gro ba'i lam ma lus par
55a4(phal chen): thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i phyogs thams cad du btang ba'i tshul ma
55a5(phal chen): lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang / sems kyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku
55a6(phal chen): kha dog mu med pa/ dbyibs mtha' yas pa bstan pa ma lus par thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis thugs su chud pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
55a7(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
55b1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos thams cad la rtag
55b2(phal chen): tu mnyam par bzhag kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams la 'ang skad cig gcig tu chos ston pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings
55b3(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang / skad cig gcig gis sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rnams kyang bdag med pa'i mtha' la gnas
55b4(phal chen): par yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum la mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis cha shas
55b5(phal chen): la'ang mnyam par bzhag cing rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyogs 'byams klas pa'i dra ba thams cad kyi sangs
55b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud dang / rnam pa thams cad la mnyam par bzhag kyang mi zad pa'i zhing gi mtha' la yang bzhugs shing rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos
55b7(phal chen): k yi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku mu med pa la mnyam par bzhag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par yang dag
56a1(phal chen): par ston pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis yongs su rgyas
56a2(phal chen): par rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems 'byung ba'i mdzod sna tshogs la yang mos pa dang yid la byed pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
56a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mur thug pa la bzhugs
56a4(phal chen): pa yang yongs su mi gtong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi brten pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang
56a5(phal chen): thugs skad cig gcig gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa yang rab tu ston to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten
56a6(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa 'byams klas pa la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas mu med pa bstan pa rnam par
56a7(phal chen): dgod pa'i tshul mu med pas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyun mi gcod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du bsgribs pa med par rtag tu
56b1(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag kyang thugs skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rtogs par thugs su chud cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog
56b2(phal chen): brnyes par bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam
56b3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas
56b4(phal chen): skye ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor ba yongs su
56b5(phal chen): bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar
56b6(phal chen): pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
56b7(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i zhing gi rgyud yongs su bstan
57a1(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
57a2(phal chen): par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su
57a3(phal chen): bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'das pa dang / ma byon dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar
57a4(phal chen): pa ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'o/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/
57a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu dgu pa'o// //bam po drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos mtshan
57a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i don du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la mi chen po'i mtshan chos kyi rgyan rin po che sna
57a7(phal chen): tshogs sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu de ni 'khor kun nas 'od zer gyi dra ba shin tu 'phro ba'i sprin rab tu 'byung zhing rgyas par 'geng pa ste/ de la mi chen
57b1(phal chen): po'i mtshan rin po che dang po dbu'i dbu mtshams na rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal po las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba bkye bas/ dpal gyis yongs su rgyas shing
57b2(phal chen): yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin rnam par bkye ba yongs su 'khyil ba'i klong gi dbyings kyi phyogs thams cad 'od kyis rnam par snang ba zhes
57b3(phal chen): bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor glog gi phreng ba lta bur 'byung bas/ phyogs mtshams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa snying po byang chub
57b4(phal chen): tu bzhugs pa ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nam mkha'i sprin kun du 'dal bas chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs mdzod
57b5(phal chen): s pu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i dbyibs las gser gyi kha dog bzang por 'od zer 'bar bar 'jig rten gyi khams su byung ba'i 'od kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de bzhin
57b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dbu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gsal ba'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la rin po che'i 'od kyi klong g.yas phyogs su
57b7(phal chen): yongs su 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi sgron ma snang bas 'jig rten
58a1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnam par 'dal ba byang chub sems dpa'i mchog rnams la snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab
58a2(phal chen): ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gser yid du 'ong ba'i sprin sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba rab tu 'bar bas
58a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang bar bstan pa'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de
58a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DU R+Ya'i 'od zer dang / me tog gi mdog gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bar rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin/
58a5(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i dbu skra/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od chags pas/ phyogs thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
58a6(phal chen): sngon gyi dka' thub dang / dpal gyi ye shes las rnam pa de lta bur byung ba'i rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de
58a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / rin po che'i 'od zer g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'phro bas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyi 'od de bzhin
58b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che 'od tshad med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa yang
58b2(phal chen): dag par ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che rnam par 'phrul pas/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtshos bkye ba'i 'od dang /
58b3(phal chen): 'od zer dri ma med pa rab tu 'phros pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
58b4(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho shin tu yangs pas chos kyi dbyings kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la/ rin po che'i rgyal po sems kyi
58b5(phal chen): rgyal po dang / in+d+ra nI la las 'od bkye ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas 'jig rten gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i
58b6(phal chen): sprin| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du nga ro 'byin cing / sangs rgyas kyi stobs yongs su dag pa rgya
58b7(phal chen): mtsho dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'byin pa'i sprin shin tu yangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
59a1(phal chen): bai DUR+Ya'i 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i dra ba mngon par 'phags pa las/ chos kyi lus dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
59a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad dang / phyogs rgya mtshor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang dag par ston cing sangs rgyas kyi stobs chos kyi dbyings la mngon du gyur pa rab tu ston par bzhugs
59a3(phal chen): pa| sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa tshad med mu med par yang dag par 'phags shing yongs su dag la dri ma med pa yongs su mnan te/ rin po che thams cad kyi
59a4(phal chen): 'od kun tu snang ba'i rang bzhin rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa na bzhugs
59a5(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan rin po che las 'od rab tu bkye bas/ zhing thams cad kun nas yog cing bsgribs pa med de/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas
59a6(phal chen): kyi gsung rin po che'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu bkye bas/ chos kyi rgya mtsho chen po rab tu sbyar ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /
59a7(phal chen): snang ba can gyi sprin langs pa'i 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DUR+Ya dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / rdo rje mang po las nor bu rin po che rnam par bton
59b1(phal chen): te| rab tu bkram pa'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od rnam par dag pa/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kun tu 'byung ba las sgra skad rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi snang ba
59b2(phal chen): rnam par ston pa'i chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes sangs rgyas sprul pa'i 'od kun du 'gyed pa'i sprin rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po
59b3(phal chen): che'i 'od g.yas phyogs su 'phro ba'i me tog rin po che'i lhab lhub kyis brgyan pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin mngon par
59b4(phal chen): 'thon pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos rnam par dag pa ste/ bskal pa thams cad du rnam par thar pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i
59b5(phal chen): sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che sems kyi rgyal po'i 'od zer dam pa rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyan du mtshan rnam par
59b6(phal chen): bkod pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin la snang ba shin tu 'byung zhing ye shes kyi sku dang / chos kyi skus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
59b7(phal chen): mtshan rgya mtsho la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su khyab pa'i sprin dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs
60a1(phal chen): pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i gzhi/ me tog dang ldan pa'i bai DUR+Ya kun tu snang bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur te/ rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rgya
60a2(phal chen): mtsho yongs su rgyas par 'gengs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo'i 'od kyi rgyan thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khebs par byang chub sems
60a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa bzhis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / nga ros chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa'i mtshan rgya mtshos thams cad du brgyan pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin
60a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i gzhi gangs chen mtsho thams cad kyi rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan tshad med pa thugs skad cig
60a5(phal chen): gis yang dag par ston cing / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gengs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i spyod pa rnam
60a6(phal chen): par gzigs pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pad+mo'i gzhi dang / rgyan gyi me tog ri rab rgya mtsho'i 'od zer rin
60a7(phal chen): po che'i gzhi sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa las byung ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i 'od kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
60b1(phal chen): dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dpal rin po che dri ma med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri dang / rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs
60b2(phal chen): brnyan khong na srel cing / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i gzhi rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyis zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du snang ba'i de bzhin
60b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bai DUR+Ya rin po che'i me tog dang / gser gyi
60b4(phal chen): pad+mo las chos kyi 'od zer gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sgron ma ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od rnam par dag pas snang ba'i rgyan bstan pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad
60b5(phal chen): du dmigs shing rnam par bkye bas tha mi dad cing sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i rin po che'i sprin dang / rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i ri/ 'od zer stug po'i sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing / chos rgya
60b6(phal chen): mtsho'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phrul pas snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa rin po che'i 'od zer
60b7(phal chen): sna tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan cing rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi nyi ma shin tu gsal ba dang / ye shes kyi 'od
61a1(phal chen): kyi chos rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par dag pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
61a2(phal chen): mtshan rin po che'i phreng ba rnam par bkye ba dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i 'od du 'phro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od seng ge rnam par snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas/ chos kyi dbyings
61a3(phal chen): thams cad du rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rdul gcig las sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du yang dag par 'phro bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dag par ston
61a4(phal chen): cing de'i dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbu la de bzhin
61a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan de kho na thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid rin po che'i rgyan rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snying po tshad med pa dang / chos
61a6(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad du snang ba'i 'od la 'jug pa zhes bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i me tog dang / seng
61a7(phal chen): ge'i zla ba 'od zer rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pa kun tu snyoms par dpal gyi sprin gyis/ chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od
61b1(phal chen): zer snang bas/ zhing dang 'jig rten mang por de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs
61b2(phal chen): pa'i mtshan sangs rgyas kyi snang ba rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyis kun tu rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi sprin phyogs bcur bkye
61b3(phal chen): ba kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i na bun gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
61b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad thugs kyi skad cig re re la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par ston cing / rgyan brjod
