90b2(phal chen): 'dzin to/ /de de ltar ye shes 'byams klas pa bcu la rab tu gnas pas yang dag par gzud pa la 'jug pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbubs su
90b3(phal chen): gzud pa la 'jug cing / skra'i sbubs gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su bsdu zhing /
90b4(phal chen): sems can gcig gi lus brjod du med pa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa sems kyi skad cig tu gzud pa la 'jug cing / sems kyi skad cig brjod du
90b5(phal chen): med pa'i bskal par 'jug pa bstan pa dang / chos gcig sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba la 'jug cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad chos gcig tu gzud pa la 'jug
90b6(phal chen): pa dang / skye mched gcig brjod du med pa'i skye mched du bya ste/ brjod du med pa'i skye mched du bya ba la 'jug cing / skye mched brjod du med pa skye mched gcig tu bstan pa la 'jug pa dang / dbang po
90b7(phal chen): gcig brjod du med pa'i dbang por bya ba la 'jug cing / dbang po brjod du med pa dbang po gcig tu gzud pa la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad dbang po med pa dang / tha mi dad par 'jug cing /
91a1(phal chen): dbang po med pa dbang por bya ba la 'jug pa dang / 'du shes thams cad 'du shes gcig tu byin gyis brlab pa la 'jug cing / 'du shes gcig 'du shes thams
91a2(phal chen): cad du byin gyis brlab pa la 'jug pa dang / tshig gcig rnam par brjod pa tshig brjod du med pa rnam par brjod pa bya ba la 'jug cing / tshig rnam par brjod pa thams cad sgra gcig gi dbyangs su byin
91a3(phal chen): gyis brlab pa la 'jug pa dang / dus gsum thams cad bsam gtan gcig tu bsdu ste/ bsam gtan gcig po dus thams cad du kun tu spro bar bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
91a4(phal chen): sras dag / yang dag par gzud pa bcu po de dag sems kyi bsam pa bcu la gnas te/ rnam par dpyad par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi spyod pa la mi
91a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa la mi gnas pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nam
91a6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs
91a7(phal chen): pa la mkhas pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / chos zab mo tha mi dad pa la mkhas pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dogs pa thams cad la lan med par bya ba'i sems
91b1(phal chen): kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dus thams cad tha mi dad cing mnyam pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid
91b2(phal chen): kyi sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs tshad med pa'i sems kyi bsam pa la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sems kyi bsam pa bcu po de dag la gnas
91b3(phal chen): te| byang chub sems dpas yang dag par gzud pa bcu po de dag rnam par dpyad par bya'o/ /de sems kyi bsam pa bcu po de dag la gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba bcu
91b4(phal chen): 'thob bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo snang ba la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs
91b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad pa'i snang ba
91b6(phal chen): la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos tha mi dad pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob po/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /
91b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig pa'i mos pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa'i tshul la 'jug par mkhas pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
92a1(phal chen): cad rang gi sems la rag lus pas rang gi stobs dang mthu phyir mi ldog pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /sangs rgyas kyi chos
92a2(phal chen): la mkhas pa'i snang ba bcu po de dag rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos de dag thos nas/ rim gro dang / zhe
92a3(phal chen): sa chen po'i bsam pas gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di la gnas pa la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang dkon pa
92a4(phal chen): ma yin te/ las gron chung ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i byin gyi rlabs rab tu 'thob bo/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
92a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam pa nyid du yang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
92a6(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid rab tu thob pas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog
92a7(phal chen): gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /gzhung de bzhin du phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
92b1(phal chen): dang | gdugs dang / nor bu rin po che dang / sprul gyi snying po'i tsan dan dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rol
92b2(phal chen): mo dkrol ba'i sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rol mo brdung ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon
92b3(phal chen): par bab bo/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam par brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas
92b4(phal chen): legs so zhes gsungs pa'i rnam par brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /lha rdzas la 'das shing chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
92b5(phal chen): gi dbyangs mngon par brjod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa rnam par brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /byang chub nye bar
92b6(phal chen): brtan pa'i rnam par brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /'od zer snang ba'i rnam pa brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /shin tu bstan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi char rnam
92b7(phal chen): pa brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gling bzhi par/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya
93a1(phal chen): ba'i snying po byang chub la byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang na bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rgyas par gang bar
93a2(phal chen): bzhugs te/ chos bstan pa 'di'ang thams cad du byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pas/ sangs rgyas
93a3(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang 'ongs
93a4(phal chen): par gyur te/ phyogs bcu bkang nas de dag 'di skad zer ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam lung bstan pa'i chos nyid brjod pa legs so/ /legs
93a5(phal chen): so| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang thams cad kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar ming mthun par sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dpal zhes bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs
93a6(phal chen): pa'i mtshan kun tu dpal gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba sha stag gi drung nas 'dir phyin te/ thams cad na yang chos bstan pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag tu
93a7(phal chen): tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / go bar bya ba 'di dag dang / brjod pa 'di dag gis lhag chad med par byung bar gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha
93b1(phal chen): stag| sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin to/ /ji ltar bdag cag 'khor 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi de bzhin gshegs
93b2(phal chen): pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i gzhir byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis phyogs bcu bkang ste phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
93b3(phal chen): pos phyogs bcur blta ste/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i dbyings yongs su
93b4(phal chen): brtod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i dbyings kun tu grags par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bskal pa thams cad kyi grangs yongs su brjod pa dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas
93b5(phal chen): 'byung ba bstan pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang dbang po ji ltar yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par bya ba brjod pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul bzhin du
93b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa don yod pa yongs su brjod par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /
93b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mthu chen po bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgras skul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs dang / sangs
94a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /thams cad shin tu dad sems kyis/ /sgrib pa ma lus thams cad rnam par bsal gyis la/ /
94a2(phal chen): yon tan 'byung gnas 'jig rten gtso bo yi/ /smon lam dam pa bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /mkhas mchog skyes bu seng ge dag /spyad pa ci 'dra sngon spyad spyod par 'gyur ba'i rnams/ /byang chub
94a3(phal chen): sems dpa' gtso rnams kyi/ /spyod pa thams cad rim gyis brjod par bya/ /'di la dpe med mchog rnams kyi/ /bskal pa'i grangs dang 'jig rten grangs dang chos bstan dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'byung
94a4(phal chen): ba dag / yongs su brjod kyi dang ba'i yid kyis nyon/ /de dag sngon chad smon lam gyis/ /sems can ji ltar sdug bsngal rnams las dgrol bya zhes/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /
94a5(phal chen): 'jig rten sgron ma skye ba rnams kyang mthong / /spyod pa ji ltar shes gyur te/ /gsung gi mchog rnams kun la mchod pa byas pas na/ /sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnyed de/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid
94a6(phal chen): rab la mngon sangs rgyas/ /sngon gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/ /sangs rgyas phyogs bcur 'od snang rab tu 'bar mdzad cing / /'od zer dra ba rab 'gyed pas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong
94a7(phal chen): gyur nas/ /bdag cag rgyal ba'i yon tan gyis/ /brgyan pa'i 'jig rten sgron ma'i dam par 'gyur bas te/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba kun mkhyen par/ /mi yi seng ger bya zhes smon lam 'debs/ /
94b1(phal chen): 'debs/ /nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i/ /sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol te/ /ngan song thams cad yongs su gcad bya zhes/ /
94b2(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i smon lam rdzogs byas te/ /de nas dpa' ba chen po spyod pa rab la spyod/ /blo brtan phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi chags med rab tu 'thob/ /skyes bu seng ge gang rnams
94b3(phal chen): kyis| |'di 'dra'i smon lam sngar btab phyir ldog mi 'gyur bar/ /'jig rten rnams na spyod mdzad pa/ /de dag don yod spyod pa brjod par bya/ /bskal pa bzang po gcig la yang / /sangs rgyas stong
94b4(phal chen): grangs tshang bar kun kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ /kun tu gzigs pa gang brjod pa/ /de dag rim gyis bshad pa 'di 'dra'o/ /bskal pa bzang po gcig bzhin du/ /brjod du med pa'i bskal pa khrag khrig
94b5(phal chen): de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas ma byon de dag gi /bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis bstan par bya/ /zhing rgyud gcig po ji bzhin du/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kun bzung ste/ /ma byon stobs
94b6(phal chen): bcu'i skyon med pa'i/ /spyod pa thams cad de bzhin bshad par bya/ /rgyal ba gang 'og gang 'byung dang / /ci mtshan de yi smon lam rnam pa ci 'dra dang / /rgyal ba gang gis gang gi lung / /bstan
94b7(phal chen): mdzad mkhas pa'i sku tshe ji tsam dang / /chos kyi rnam pa dge ba ni/ /gang gis bsgrubs te dam pa brnyes par gyur pa dang / /'jig rten ji ltar btul ba dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos cir gnas
95a1(phal chen): dang | |rnam dag zhing yang ci 'dra dang / /sems can rnam par dag dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /bstan pa'i dus dang dus min dang / /de las gang zag rnam par
95a2(phal chen): dag 'gyur dang / /sems can rnams kyi las gang dang / /spyod pa gang dang rnam grol ci 'drar 'gyur ba dang / /dbang po rno rtul bar ma dang / /spyod mchog sems can 'dul ba'ang bstan
95a3(phal chen): par bya/ /'di 'dra'i shes par 'jug pa la/ /spyod pa'i dam pa rnams kyis rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /bzang po'i 'byung gnas spyod pa dang / /'gro kun ye shes 'khor lo spyod
95a4(phal chen): zhugs pa/ /lus kyi las la chags med cing / /ngag la chags med sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam dag la/ /sems spyod chags pa med pa yis/ /dus gsum ma lus
95a5(phal chen): rgyas par khyab par byed/ /'dri 'dra kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa'i mchog la pha rol phyin pa thob gyur pa/ /brjod du med pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /chos dbyings
95a6(phal chen): kun tu rab tu rjod par byed/ /ma 'ongs dus kyi bskal pa dang / /'byams klas zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad kyang / /skad cig sems kyis rab tu shes/ /
95a7(phal chen): chos nyid de la rnam par rtog pa med/ /gang rnams spyod pa'i sa 'di la/ /spyod pa'i dam pas rjes su zhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams
95b1(phal chen): kyi| |yon tan spyod pa phyogs tsam bshad par bya/ /mtha' dang dbus med ye shes can/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi spyod yul mchog la zhugs gyur pa/ /thams cad
95b2(phal chen): shes byed mkhas pa'i rnams/ /mi ldog spyod pas rab tu zhugs gyur cing / /'od byed blo gros dam pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam mchog la zhugs gyur
95b3(phal chen): pa| |dpe zla med pa de dag gi / ye shes tshul dang spyod pa brjod par bya/ /rdul phran gcig gi cha shas la/ /'jig rten khams rnams ji snyed de dag shes
95b4(phal chen): pa dang / /spyod pa rgya che thos gyur na/ /'jig rten de dag thams cad mos par 'gyur/ /rdul phran gcig la ji lta ba/ /de bzhin rdul phran thams cad ma lus
95b5(phal chen): gzung bya ste/ /ye shes bzang po de dag ni/ /'jig rten khams la 'jug pa bsam mi khyab/ /de dag dus kyi rnam pa la'ang / /rdul phran gcig gi khyon gyi cha la yang dag
95b6(phal chen): 'jug / rdul phran gcig la de bzhin du/ /zhing yangs rnam pa tha dad kun la 'jug /rdul phran thams cad re re la/ /zhing rnams brjod du med pa mang po 'dzud pa byed/ /
95b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad du ma dang / /gcig dang tshad med de bzhin rab tu shes/ /ji snyed ci yang ma lus pa'i/ /chos dbyings gzung ba thams cad yang dag gzung byed cing / /
96a1(phal chen): mtshan nyid tha dad sna tshogs te/ /sems can grangs kyi bskal pa rgyud mi mnyam/ /'jig rten phra bar 'jug pa la/ /phra la shin tu gzhol bas phra bar 'jug
96a2(phal chen): bya ste| |brjod du med pa rab bstan pa'i/ /bskal pa thams cad ma lus 'dzud pa byed/ /de dag ring dang thung ba dang / /dus kyi skad cig sems la bskal pa mi mthun shes/ /shes
96a3(phal chen): spyod mi mnyam ma yin pa'i/ /shes pas de dag thams cad khong du chud/ /yangs dang yangs min mkhas pas na/ /'jig rten zab mo rnams la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /lus la
96a4(phal chen): zhing rnams de shes te/ /zhing la'ang de bzhin gcig min lus 'dzud do/ /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/ /phyogs rnams kun la 'jug cing skad cig du ma dang / /'jig rten
96a5(phal chen): khams rnams 'byams klas la/ /tshad med gzi brjid ldan pa rab tu 'jug /gang yang zhing rnams mtha' yas shing / /dbus med gzung ba byas shing dus kyi dbyings su 'dzud/ /
96a6(phal chen): zhing gi rgyud la mkhas pa'i rnams/ /shes dang ldan pas ye shes rab tu 'byung / /bzang po'i yon tan ldan pa'i rnams/ /phyogs dang 'jig rten khams kyi rgyud du gyur pa dag /
96a7(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa der 'jug ste/ /brjod du med pa de dag rab tu shes/ /zhing dang zhing gis rnams kyi/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu 'thob/ /de dag tshul yang rab tu
96b1(phal chen): shes| |las rnams gang gis sbyangs pa'ang khong du chud/ /gang yang zhing rnams du ma dag /las rnams khrag khrig kun gyis kun nas nyon mongs par/ /'gro ba kun du bsgrub
96b2(phal chen): byas pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyud kyang ci 'dra shes/ /brjod du med pa yangs pa'i rnams/ /zhing gcig bstan pas de dag yongs su shes par gyur/ /de 'dra'i zhing la 'jug pa
96b3(phal chen): dang | |gang la grangs med de dag kun la 'jug / 'jig rten khams ni gcig la yang / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad yang dag 'dzud pa byed/ /'jig rten gcig tu bsgongs
96b4(phal chen): mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams rnams de bzhin 'dres mi 'gyur/ /spyi'u tshugs rnams dang gong ma'i rnams/ /bla dang 'og gis rnams yongs su gzung bya ste/ /'gro ba'i rnam par ming
96b5(phal chen): thogs pa/ /'jig rten kun la 'jug cing rab tu shes/ /snrel zhing rgyu ba'i rgyud rnams dang / /zhing rnams mtha' yas mtha' dang dbus yod ma yin pa/ /sna tshogs yangs pa rab tu shes//
96b6(phal chen): rnam pa gcig shes rnam pa tha dad shes/ /zhing gi grangs rnams rab tu shes/ /ye shes chags med mtha' ldan kun gyi grangs rnams kyang / /bzang po'i theg pa spyod pa yis/ /rgyal sras
96b7(phal chen): kun du bzang rnams rab tu shes/ /'jig rten thams cad sprul pa dang / /sems can rnam par sprul dang de bzhin zhing sprul dang / /chos rnams sprul pa'i tshul shes pa/ /sangs
97a1(phal chen): rgyas sprul pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /'jig rten phra zhing zab pa dang / /yangs shing sna tshogs yangs pas cho ma cho dgu'i rnams/ /sna tshogs tha dad rnam
97a2(phal chen): bsags pa/ /las kyi rnam smin gnas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yis/ /chos dbyings 'jug par bya la shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /rgyal sras mtha'
97a3(phal chen): dang dbus med pa/ /phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus 'gengs par byed/ /'jig rten khams rnams de dag gi /ming ni bskal pa sems can snyed kyis mthar thug cing / /zad
97a4(phal chen): par brjod par mi nus te/ /ming bshad gal te sangs rgyas gsung na gsung / /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi yang / /mtshan rnams mtshan nyid mi mthun rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan/ /
97a5(phal chen): bskal pa brjod med zad byas kyang / /mtshan rnams gcig nas gcig brgyud mthar thug med/ /'on kyang dma' ba'i sems med par/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dus gsum bde gshegs
97a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings la byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sa la'ang rab tu zhugs/ /dran pas chags med dag pa ste/ /chags med yid dang ldan zhing blo gros mtha'
97a7(phal chen): yas pas/ /ye shes blo gros mchog ldan pa/ /chos dbyings bshad la pha rol phyin pa thob/ /gang gis 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /yangs dang phra ba rnam pa sna tshogs shes gyur
97b1(phal chen): cing | |der ni 'das pa'i dus rnams la/ /sems gcig bskyed pas rab tu 'jug pa byed/ /mi yi seng ge de dag tu/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa sna tshogs rnam pas chags med par/ /byang
97b2(phal chen): chub mchog tu sangs rgyas shing / /rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa mdzad/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus rnams kyi/ /rjes su gang byon de yi bskal pa ci 'dra dang / /de la mi yi seng ge
97b3(phal chen): gang | |skye bar 'gyur ba de dag kun kyang shes/ /smon lam spyod pa ci 'dra dang / /spyod yul gang rnams bsgom pa gang gis grub gyur cing / /bsgrub pa'i rnam pa ci 'dra bas/ /bskal pa gang
97b4(phal chen): la byang chub 'tshang rgya dang / /de dag 'khor kyang khong du chud/ /sku tshe'i tshad dang sems can 'dul ba ci 'dra dang / /chos kyi sgo mo gang zhig gis/ /'gro bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba shes//
97b5(phal chen): de ltar kun tu bzang po yi/ /ye shes mchog gis bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa'i sa gnas shing / /de dag thams cad rab tu shes/ /de ni 'gro gtso kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/ /de ltar byung ba
97b6(phal chen): gzung byas shing / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad 'dab chags ma lus par/ /'jig rten khams la rab tu 'jug /de bzhin chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu shes/ /des
97b7(phal chen): ni mi yi gtso bo rnams/ /dgra las rgyal zhing thams cad gzigs pa ji snyed pa/ /mi thub rgol ba dpa' bo'i rnams/ /chos kyi mnga' la pha rol phyin brnyes pa/ /de dag 'khor kyang
98a1(phal chen): rab tu shes/ /sems can 'dul dang zhing rnams rnam par dag pa dang / /rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnams/ /sems pas bskal pa yangs pa
98a2(phal chen): zad par byed/ /skyes bu'i mchog rnams 'dul mdzad cing / /'jig rten mchog tu phyin pa'i byin rlabs dam pa la/ /mi zad mdzod kyi shes yangs pas/ /ye shes tshul la
98a3(phal chen): mkhas pa rab tu 'jug / chags med mig gis blta ba dang / /chags med rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa sgrub byed cing / /chags pa med pa'i lus yangs dang / /yangs pa'i lces
98a4(phal chen): kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /dam pa'i sems la chags med de/ /bsam pa kun tu rnam yangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /ye shes 'byung gnas bdag nyid che/ /dus gsum
98a5(phal chen): sems rnams ma lus des khyab bo/ /sprul pa'i pha rol phyin thob cing / /zhing rnams sprul pa'i bslab par bya ba bslab pa'i rnams/ /sems can sprul la mkhas pa dag /
98a6(phal chen): sprul pa sprul pas 'jig rten 'dul ba byed/ /'du shes rnam pa du ma ste/ /des ni 'jig rten sna tshogs ma lus rnam par bris/ /de dag thams cad rab tu shes/ /sangs
98a7(phal chen): rgyas ye shes tshul la rab tu 'jug / 'khor rnams brjod du med pa dag /sangs rgyas sku rnams re re dag la yod pa'i rnams/ /kun la 'jug cing mthong bar byed/ /sems can
98b1(phal chen): rnam par 'dul ba'i mtha' yang med/ /ye shes zab mo mthong bas na/ /ye shes nyi ma shin tu gsal ba shar gyur pa'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa la/ /'jig rten 'byams klas
98b2(phal chen): kun tu 'jug par byed/ /ji lta'i tshul du zhugs gyur cing / /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rnam par bkod 'dra bar/ /sems can tshul bzhin rab tu 'phags/ /khams gsum
98b3(phal chen): thams cad mig yor tshul 'drar shes/ /'on kyang rtog dang rnam rtog med/ /'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med kun la rtog mi byed/ /rtog dang rtog med mkhas pa ste/ /rtog pa'i
98b4(phal chen): shes pas rnam par rtog pa med/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa rnams/ /sems bskyed gcig la yang dag 'du bar 'dzud byed cing / /'jig rten mi khom 'di mthong nas/ /skad cig
98b5(phal chen): sems kyis thams cad shes par byed/ /brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams kyang / /sems bskyed gcig gis thams cad yongs su 'da' bar byed/ /bskal pa brjod med zad byed
98b6(phal chen): kyang | |skra rtse'i cha shas gcig las g.yo ba med/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa dag /nyi ma gcig dang yud tsam gcig tu 'dzud byed kyang / /ring dang thung la gzhol ba med/ /skad
98b7(phal chen): cig gcig la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin/ /sems kyi rnam pa 'jig rten kun/ /'jig rten rnam pa sems can kun gyi sems yin te/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi grangs su zhugs/ /'on kyang
99a1(phal chen): de dag mi gnyis rtog pa med/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'jig rten te/ /sems can zhing dang sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no/ /'on kyang 'jig rten
99a2(phal chen): mgon po'i rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun la gcig tu snyoms/ /lus rnams brjod du med pa yis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing yongs su ston/ /
99a3(phal chen): 'on kyang lus la gzhol ba med/ /chos nyid rten pa gnas med rab tu shes/ /'on kyang mi yi seng ge rnams/ /gnyis la gnas pa'i shes pas byung ba ma yin te/ /mi gnyis
99a4(phal chen): pa la'ang gnas pa med/ /gnyis dang gnyis med chos rnams rab tu shes/ /ji ltar smig rgyu rab rib dang / /mig yor sgra brnyan de bzhin rmi lam 'dra ba dang / /rmi lam rnam
99a5(phal chen): pa sprul pa ltar/ /'gro ba thams cad ma lus rab tu shes/ /de ltar spyod yul nyams med pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs kyi rjes su 'byung ba yin/ /kun tu bzang po'i ye
99a6(phal chen): shes dang / /chos kyi dbyings la shin tu bdal ba yin/ /snying rje chen po mtha' yas kyang / /sems can med dang mnyam par zhing rnams thams cad sgom/ /sngon nas nyon mongs
99a7(phal chen): nyams med pa'i/ /bsam pa dag pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gro/ /mi zad mkha' ltar rnam dag pa'i/ /rgya che shin tu yangs pa'i sa la rab tu zhugs/ /gsung ba'i seng ge
99b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi/ /tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rjes su dran/ /'jig rten rab tu spros pa la/ /smon lam tshad med yongs su gdab pa byas pas na/ /de dag spyod pa yongs su
99b2(phal chen): dag / 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgyas par khyab/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams thams cad dang / /'jig rten
99b3(phal chen): rnams dang 'jig rten chos/ /chags med tha dad med pa'i tshul du shes/ /chos kyi sku yi snying po can/ /de yi lus la 'jig rten thams cad gzud byas shing / /'jig rten de yi
99b4(phal chen): lus yin yang / /'jig rten kun gyis de la gos pa med/ /ji ltar dang ba'i chu gsal la/ /gzugs brnyan yongs su snang yang der song 'phos pa med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams
99b5(phal chen): cad kyi/ /rjes su lus 'gro der song 'phos pa med/ /de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ /gos pa med cing 'jig rten yongs su dag pas na/ /lus ni mkha' dang 'dra ba ste/ /de yi
99b6(phal chen): lus rnams gang yang skyes pa med/ /mi zad pa yi lus shes pas/ /de ni nam yang skyes shes 'gags pa med pa ste/ /rtag dang mi rtag ma yin par/ /'jig rten kun la'ang rnam
99b7(phal chen): par dmigs pa byed/ /lta ba'i rnam pa rab tu 'gags/ /brtan pa de dag yang dag lta ba ston pa byed/ /bdag gi med cing gnas pa med/ /len pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang
100a1(phal chen): mnyam/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa zhig /sna tshogs mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad gzugs 'phrul byed/ /'on kyang de la 'gro ba med/ /gang du 'gro
100a2(phal chen): ba de bzhin mi dmigs so/ /sgyu ma tshad med ma yin te/ /sgyu ma tshad kyis dmigs par bya ba'ang ma yin no/ /tshad med tshad dang ldan pa yang / /tshogs kyi dbus su ston
100a3(phal chen): pa rab tu byed/ /de bzhin rtogs pa'i blo ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams las byung / /sems ni tshad yod ma yin te/ /tshad med pa la gnas pa'ang de dag
100a4(phal chen): min| |'du shes rnam pa gcig min te/ /de dag tshad med pa dang tshad dang ldan pa ston/ /lam gyi rgyud dang 'brel ba med/ /tshad med rnams gnas pa'ang de bzhin med/ /
100a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos rnams zab pa ste/ /shin tu yangs pas zab cing zhi bas de bzhin zab/ /zab mo sna tshogs rgyud rnams dang / /mtha' yas zab pa rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /ye shes
100a6(phal chen): bzang po rmongs pa med/ /rgyud la dri ma med pas bsam pa rnam par dag /byin gyis rlob la mkhas pas na/ /srog chags bye ba shin tu dag par byed/ /dge bar byed pa'i
100a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnams/ /rab tu brjod cing dge dang mi dge rnam par ston/ /gnas la mngon par ma chags pas/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu/ /sems can
100b1(phal chen): med mthar phyin gyur kyang / /'jig rten thams cad ma lus de dag khong du chud/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus par/ /rnam par sangs rgyas mya ngan gar mi 'da'/ /chos rnams
100b2(phal chen): bgrang ba'i tshul la mkhas/ /sems can bgrang tshul shes kyang grangs la skyes pa med/ /chos kyi sprin chen char 'bebs shing / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad snang bar
100b3(phal chen): byed| |sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus la/ /sems bskyed gcig gis de dag rab tu 'jug /de dag phyir ldog med pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi khams las phyir mi ldog /
100b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku ni thob gyur kyang / /chos rnams 'di dag lus yod ma yin rab tu shes/ /lus rnams kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /lus kyi rnam phye 'jig rten rab tu shes/ /sems can kun
100b5(phal chen): tu rgyu ba dang / /bskal pa rnams dang zhing la pha rol phyin pa thob/ /phyogs rnams rgya mtsho gangs chen mtshor/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pas zhugs/ /lus rnams thams
100b6(phal chen): cad re re las/ /sems can kun gyi lus rnams sna tshogs ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas pa/ /ye shes shin tu yangs pa de ston to/ /skad cig gcig gi dus tshul
100b7(phal chen): la| |mi yi gtso bo mang po 'byung ba rab tu shes/ /bskal pa mang po brjod med du/ /mi yi seng ge bgrang bas zad mi 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngan 'da' ba yang / /skad cig gcig
101a1(phal chen): la tshad med shin tu yangs pa 'byung / /ring bsrel rnam dbye mang po yang / /ye shes dri med phra bas ston pa byed/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi yang / /mi yi
101a2(phal chen): seng ge mtha' yas smon lam 'debs pa'i rnams/ /byang chub dri med sems bskyed pa/ /ye shes yangs shing shin tu phra bas shes/ /bzang po spyod la gnas bcas shing / /de
101a3(phal chen): bzhin du gsum gshegs pa'i sems can gtso bo rnams/ /ji snyed skyes par gyur pa dag /de dag thams cad ma lus rab tu shes/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas na/ /mtha'
101a4(phal chen): dang dbus med spyod pa'i sa dang de bzhin du/ /ye shes 'byung gnas blo gros la/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i spyod pas phyir mi ldog /ye shes phra mo ra ba yangs pa/ /stobs bcu rnams
101a5(phal chen): kyi spyod yul mchog la de dag zhugs/ /bzang po rtogs pa'i blo can rnams/ /phyir mi ldog la 'jug pa brjod bya na/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yang dag gzhol
101a6(phal chen): bar bya la de dag zhugs pas na/ /spyod las phyir ldog med pa ste/ /byang chub dam pa zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya/ /de 'dra'i sems rgyud gcig la yang / /mtha' dang dbus med
101a7(phal chen): sems rnams yang dag 'dzud pa byed/ /shin tu yangs pa'i tshad med las/ /'du shes de dang de la yang dag bsgrubs/ /nyon mongs med dang nyon mongs dang / /slob
101b1(phal chen): dang mi slob sems kyang de bzhin rab tu shes/ /sems rgyud de dag re re la/ /sems rnams brjod du med pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /gcig dang gnyis su shes pa med/ /de dag
101b2(phal chen): yongs su 'dres par 'gyur ba'ang med pa ste/ /so so'i 'du shes rnam pa la/ /sems can de dag skyes par gyur pa yin/ /'di na 'dug par mthong gyur kyang / /sems can
101b3(phal chen): brjod med gzhan dang gzhan sems ldan pa'i rnams/ /gzhan gyi zhing phyir 'du shes kyang / /'jig rten sna tshogs rnams la rab tu skye/ /'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa la/ /spyod
101b4(phal chen): pa'i mchog gis rjes su zhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i ming thob ste/ /'jig rten mgon po kun gyi rjes su skyes/ /sems can bye ba la la ni/ /ngan song 'grangs
101b5(phal chen): pa'i ming thogs mtho ris 'du shes 'gyur/ /la la mtho ris sa rnams kyi/ /rnam pa kun la ngan song 'du shes 'gyur/ /'jig rten mi mtshungs skal la ltos/ /rnam pa tha dad
101b6(phal chen): las kyi sa las rab tu skyes/ /'du shes rnam pa mtha' yas te/ /gcig min yangs la 'jig rten rab tu 'jug /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /'du shes dra ba
101b7(phal chen): skal ba mi mnyam rab tu shes/ /mig 'phrul sgyu ma'i tshul gyis na/ /skad cig gcig gis sems kyis rab tu gzhol/ /de bzhin dbang po rnams la ste/ /mig gi skye mched
102a1(phal chen): rna ba sna yi skye mched dang / /lce dang lus dang yid la yang / /'jig rten rnam pa tha dad 'du shes 'jug /mig rnams re re'i yul la yang / /mtha' dang
102a2(phal chen): dbus med mig rnams rab tu 'dzud pa byed/ /rnam pa tha dad du ma ste/ /tshad med kun la'ang zhen par 'gyur ba med/ /'on kyang phan tshun gcig gis gcig /bde zhing gnod
102a3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba de dag kun na med/ /bdag bdag so so'i las kyi rnams/ /ji ltar bsags pa'i tshul bzhin nyams su myong / /bzang zhes bya ba de dag kun/ /tshad med stobs dang
102a4(phal chen): ye shes sa yi shes rab kyi/ /'byams klas mig rnams thams cad la/ /rab tu zhugs pas shin tu rtogs pa yin/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad kyang / /thams cad ma lus
102a5(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad 'jig tshul du/ /thams cad shin tu shes gyur kyang / /rgya chen spyod pas mya ngan mi 'da'o/ /sangs rgyas shin tu bstan pa dang / /sems can bstan dang de bzhin
102a6(phal chen): zhing rnams bstan pa dang / /dus rnams shin tu bstan pa dang / /bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa kun kyang shes/ /la la 'di la 'das gyur kyang / /gzhan dang gzhan rnams ma
102a7(phal chen): 'ongs dus la gnas pa yin/ /'on kyang ma 'ongs dus kyi rnams/ /la las da ltar byung bar rab tu shes/ /de 'dra'i tshul can gcig min pa'i/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid tha
102b1(phal chen): dad thams cad rab tu shes/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che
102b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba las/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// //bam po bdun cu tham pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen pos
102b3(phal chen): rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku gcig pas mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas
102b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul mngon par mkhyen pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku mnga' ba/ mtshan nyid yong nas med pa'i
102b5(phal chen): chos la rten pa chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i spyod yul gyis yang dag par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med cing mtshungs pa'i mngon par 'tshang rgya ba brnyes pa/ rnam par thar pa
102b6(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul la shin tu dgyes pa/ chos kyi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi pho brang khang pa
102b7(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can 'od kun nas 'byung ba/ rgyan chen po dang ldan pa 'od dang zhing gsal ba rnam
103a1(phal chen): par snang ba'i snying po can/ sangs rgyas skye ba chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus las byung ba/ gzhi 'od
103a2(phal chen): zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rang bzhin du gnas pas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i chos chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ de
103a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas btugs pa/ ye shes kyi yul yang dag pa'i mtha' spyod yul chags pa med pas rnam par gsal
103a4(phal chen): b a na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che bzang po'i pad+mo chen po rang rang gi smon lam gyi byung ba'i dbus kyi snying po la 'khod pa kun kyang tshe gcig gis
103a5(phal chen): thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas phyin pa/ ye shes chen po rnam par phye ba'i spyod yul la gzhol ba/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i gzhi mnyam pa nyid
103a6(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings gzhi med cing mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ chos thams cad 'byung ba med cing mngon par grub pa med pa mngon du byas pa/ byang
103a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lus las ma g.yos par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun gyis brjod pa/ de bzhin gshegs
103b1(phal chen): pa'i ye shes las mngon du byung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rgyun ma chad pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin
103b2(phal chen): chos kyi lus gcig cing tha mi dad pas/ gzugs kyi lus mtha' yas pa'i sgo kun tu ston pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa shin tu shes pa sems can gyi
103b3(phal chen): khams su rnam par spyad pa las phyir mi ldog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid thob pas sprul pa mngon par sgrub pa de bzhin
103b4(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon lhan cig tu skyes shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /
103b5(phal chen): kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal dang / rdo rje dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba bsgribs pa med pa'i zla ba
103b6(phal chen): dang | nyi ma'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i blo dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od zer gyi rgyal po dang /
103b7(phal chen): blo gros rgya mtsho'i mchog 'dzin cing blo la rnam par rtse ba gsal bas mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu mi 'jigs pa'i
104a1(phal chen): seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par rtse bas mngon par shes pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi
104a2(phal chen): zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas de bzhin
104a3(phal chen): gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer/ 'od zer gyi 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po'i 'od zer dang ldan pa byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams
104a4(phal chen): 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas/ 'jig rten g.yas phyogs su lan bcur bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bstan nas/ byang
104a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bskul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod nas/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi skye
104a6(phal chen): ba dang / shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas rnam par sangs rgyas
104a7(phal chen): ba'i gdan bstan par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa 'byams klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
104b1(phal chen): pa| nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
104b2(phal chen): cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ de byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi spyi bor nub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
104b3(phal chen): de dag thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'dzin cing dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/ 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba 'di lta bu byung bas na/ chos chen po brjod par ni 'gyur du nges so snyam nas rtogs
104b4(phal chen): pa'i blo yang thob par gyur to/ /'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyi lus la phog par gyur ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe
104b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal pad+mo'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pad+mo'i snying po
104b6(phal chen): de la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/
104b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rnam dag blo mnga' yon tan mkhyen pas 'phags pa/ /spyod yul chags pa med pa'i pha rol phyin brnyes/ /dus gsum
105a1(phal chen): mnyam pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa ston pa/ /khyod la bdag ni bsti stang rim gro bgyid do/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i spyod yul pha rol phyin brnyes/ /mtshan
105a2(phal chen): gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i sku yang ston mdzad/ /dri med 'od can 'od zer stong dang ldan 'gyed/ /bdud kyi sde rnams ma lus rab tu 'joms mdzad/ /phyogs bcu kun na gang
105a3(phal chen): rnams ji snyed mchis pa'i/ /zhing rnams thams cad ma lus rab tu bskyod kyang / /thugs rje ldan pas su la'ang 'jigs par mi mdzad/ /khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu ni de 'dra de tshul/
105a4(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings la mnyam pa nyid du rab zhugs/ /de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyang brnyes gyur/ /sems can stong phrag bye ba grol bar mdzad cing / /sems can kun
105a5(phal chen): gyi sdig chen rab tu zhi mdzad/ /bskal pa stong du brtul zhugs dam po spyod de/ /byang chub mchog gi lam ni yang dag bsgrubs nas/ /chags pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul 'di
105a6(phal chen): brnyes| |sangs rgyas kun dang rang bzhin gcig tu rab 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di nas 'od bkye/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus kun tu bskyod nas/ /cho 'phrul
105a7(phal chen): mtha' yas yang dag bstan pa bgyi ste/ /bdag gi lus 'dir de dag ma lus zhugs gyur/ /de la bdag gi blo gros 'di ltar skyes te/ /chos rje khyod la bdag gis zhu ba'i
105b1(phal chen): dus bab/ /shin tu nges pa'i chos la rab tu bslabs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dus par gyur snyam/ /tshogs 'di dag pa 'dus pas rnam par dag pa/ /'jig
105b2(phal chen): rten slob dpon mgon pos rab tu bsngags pa/ /ye shes mtha' yas ldan pa yul la chags med/ /de 'dra'i mthu chen dpa' bo 'di dag 'dir phyin/ /de don 'jig rten slob dpon
105b3(phal chen): drang srong chen po/ /ye shes stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas byung gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag snang bar mdzad gsol/ /chos rab bdag gis gang zhus de yang bshad
105b4(phal chen): gsol/ /drang srong chen po'i spyod yul 'di dag bstan cing / /yang dag ma nor brjod par nus pa gang lags/ /skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi sras ni gang lags/ /'jig rten mgon
105b5(phal chen): gyi gtso bo khyod kyis bshad gsol/ /tshigs su bshad pa de dag gsol ma thag tu de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ mi bsnyengs pa'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
105b6(phal chen): 'khor gyi 'od zer khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dang ldan pa byung ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten g.yas
105b7(phal chen): phyogs su lan bcur bskor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bskul ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi
106a1(phal chen): khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod nas/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ bdud kyi
106a2(phal chen): khyim thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gdan bstan pa byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor
106a3(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa 'byams klas pa rab tu bstan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par 'byams klas pa
106a4(phal chen): thams cad ma lus par rgyas par khyab par byas nas phyir 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/ byang chub
106a5(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i kha'i sgor nub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la reg par gyur ma thag tu/ de
106a6(phal chen): nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri sngon ci 'dra ba de las/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri brgya phrag stong 'gyur
106a7(phal chen): du bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gdan ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi lus kyi seng ge'i khri las/ byang chub
106b1(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri brgya phrag stong 'gyur du bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
106b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho
106b3(phal chen): 'phrul chen po/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par dka' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu bstan na/ kye rgyal
106b4(phal chen): ba'i sras/ de gang gi sngon gyi mtshan mar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106b5(phal chen): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ni bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
106b6(phal chen): kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra ba dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par dgongs pa dang / cho
106b7(phal chen): 'phrul chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis/ de bzhin gshegs
107a1(phal chen): ba skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming thos par gyur ma thag tu de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
107a2(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye
107a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ legs par spobs par mdzod cig /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
107a4(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa khong du chud par bya/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'khor 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
107a5(phal chen): stong kun nas 'dus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ las kyi mtha' shin tu sbyangs pa/ dran pa dang /
107a6(phal chen): blo gros dang / rigs pas shin tu 'phags pa/ rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / tshul la rab tu
107a7(phal chen): gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa ma nyams pa/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes
107b1(phal chen): pa chen pos rnam par rol pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin rang gi rgyud du len pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs
107b2(phal chen): pa ste| de dag la sogs pa yon tan dang / legs pa tshad med pa mang po dang ldan pa sha stag 'ongs shing 'dus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ khyod kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
107b3(phal chen): brgya stong mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad kyi rnam par mngon par
107b4(phal chen): rol par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la the tshom yongs su chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
107b5(phal chen): cad kyi byin gyis byin du brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam yang dag par ston pa/
107b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa
107b7(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa yon tan mang po tshad med pa'i khyad par gyi mthar thug pa yin gyi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
108a1(phal chen): rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa dang / sku yang dag par bstan pa dang / dbyangs rab tu brjod pa dang / thugs kyi mthu dang / yul gyi gnas
108a2(phal chen): dang | spyod yul bstan pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan
108a3(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba bstan pa la legs par spobs pa mdzod cig /
108a4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis don 'di nyid yang bzlas te brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
108a5(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ chags med blo gros shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas blo ldan/ /ye shes mtha' yas yul la mnyam pa nyid du gyur
108a6(phal chen): pa| |rgyal ba'i spyod yul tshad med legs par yang dag shod cig / de thos sangs rgyas sras rnams thams cad rab tu dga' 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchog rnams 'byung ba ji ltar byang
108a7(phal chen): chub sems dpas/ /khong du chud bya ji ltar de dag yang dag blta bya/ /de bzhin gshegs thugs ci 'drar sku dag dbyangs kyang ci 'dra/ /skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyi yul dang spyod
108b1(phal chen): yul ci 'dra/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub ji ltar rnam par 'tshang rgya/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rgyal ba ji ltar bskor mdzad/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag nyid kyang
108b2(phal chen): gsung ste/ /sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas 'di dag dga' bar mdzod cig /gang gis bde gshegs chos rgyal chen po mthong bar gyur cing / /gang rnams 'grogs shing dge ba yang
108b3(phal chen): dag skyed par byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams 'phel ba'ang ma nor brjod par mdzod cig /bde gshegs mthong na cir 'gyur de dang 'grogs na ci 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das dang
108b4(phal chen): 'on tam bzhugs kyang rung ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams gang gis thos par gyur cing / /yon tan 'byung gnas rnams la gang rnams dad pa bskyed pa/ /de dag don kyang
108b5(phal chen): cir 'gyur 'khor 'dir bstan par mdzod cig / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad thal mo sbyar cing / /bde bar gshegs dang khyod dang bdag la kun kyang lta sdod/ /dris pa 'di
108b6(phal chen): dag sems can dag pa khyod kyis lung ston/ /yon tan rgya mtsho che mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul bstan mdzod/ /de dag don du chos rab ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod cing / /mkha' 'dra khyod kyi
108b7(phal chen): skye bo rnams kyi the tshom gcad mdzod/ /dpe dang rgyur ldan tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ston/ /thos nas sems can khrag khrig byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed/ /ji ltar zhing rnams
109a1(phal chen): thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang zhing / /rgyal ba sku yi yan lag sna tshogs yang dag ston mdzod/ /ji ltar khrag khrig chos dang ldan pa'i gsung rab
109a2(phal chen): brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dpe dang rgyu yis bstan par mdzod cig /gang zhig phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams khrag khrig thams cad kun tu/ /bskal pa mang po bye ba mtha'
109a3(phal chen): yas 'grangs par song yang / /de ring rgyal sras 'dir tshogs 'di 'dra'i 'khor dang 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar shin tu dka'o/ /de bas rgyal sras
109a4(phal chen): rang bzhin dag pa khyod kyis bshad mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs yangs yongs su ston cig /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad thal mo sbyar
109a5(phal chen): te| |yangs pa'i chos kyis skom zhing chos la don gnyer gnas so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ byang
109a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye
109a7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa/ tshad med pa'i chos kyi byung ba 'di
109b1(phal chen): ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gcig ma
109b2(phal chen): yin pa dang / rkyen gcig ma yin pas yang dag par 'grub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /chos bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong /
109b3(phal chen): tshad med/ grangs med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rgyus/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
109b4(phal chen): sngon 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa bskyed pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon shin tu
109b5(phal chen): sbyangs shing yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po tshad med pas sems can yongs su bskyab pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / spyod pa dang /
109b6(phal chen): smon lam tshad med pa rgyun 'chad pa med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po mi ngoms par yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs
109b7(phal chen): rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i rgyun tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi lam rnam par dag cing tshad med
110a1(phal chen): pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / lam gyi yan lag rnam par dgod pa tshad
110a2(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i chos tshad med pa khong du chud pas mthar phyin par bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
110a3(phal chen): chos bcu po de dag la sogs pa chos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong / tshad med/ grangs med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rgyus/ de bzhin gshegs
110a4(phal chen): pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba ni/ rgyu gcig gis 'byung ba ma yin/
110a5(phal chen): rkyen gcig gis 'byung ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rgyu tshad med pa dang / rkyen tshad med pa dang / bsgrub pa tshad
110a6(phal chen): med pas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sprin chen po'i char dus las mi 'da' bar rab tu 'bab pas kyang rgyu byas la/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi rgyun mi 'chad par
110a7(phal chen): ldang bas kyang rgyu byas nas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su gzung ba'i
110b1(phal chen): phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su skem pa zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i phung po yongs su bskam pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gzhog pa zhes bya ba ni/
110b2(phal chen): gzhal med khang thams cad yongs su dgod pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /rlung gi khams dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod par zhes bya ba ni/ sems can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
110b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa thams cad kyi rkyen du skyes pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs kyis gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan rnam par phye
110b4(phal chen): ba| shin tu rnam par dbye bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir ldang ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag la sogs pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas/
110b5(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang / 'byung ba de la 'byung bar byed pa gang yang med de/ 'byung bar 'gyur
110b6(phal chen): ba yang med pa ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sres dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang / rgyu gcig ma yin pa dang /
110b7(phal chen): rkyen gcig ma yin pas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu tshad med pa dang /
111a1(phal chen): rnam pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa tshad med pas 'byung ste/ 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du sngon chos kyi
111a2(phal chen): sprin gyi char chen po bab pas kyang rgyu byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi rgyun mi 'chad par ldang bas kyang rgyu byas nas/ yang dag par 'grub
111a3(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dran pas yang dag par bzung zhing gzungs kyis chud mi za ba
111a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi sprin chen po'i char yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir ldang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil
111a5(phal chen): 'khor chen po lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas kyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bskam pa'i phyir ldang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
111a6(phal chen): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ldang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
111a7(phal chen): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul pa'i rgyun rnam par bkod pa rnam par 'byed cing rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni sems can sngon yongs su smin par byas pa rnams kyi
111b1(phal chen): rkyen du 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyi phyir ldang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag la sogs
111b2(phal chen): pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa tshad med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid rab tu thob pa'i phyir 'byung
111b3(phal chen): bar 'gyur te/ de la 'byung bar byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa gang yang med de/ 'byung ba'ang med pa ma yin no/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag /dpe'i sgo dang pos khong du chud par bya ba 'dis/
111b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
111b5(phal chen): gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ gcig tu sdug cing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba'i sprin
111b6(phal chen): chen po'i char 'bab ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis gzung ba'am/ bzod par mi nus so/ /kye
111b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tha mi dad pa zhes bya
112a1(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid kyi stobs dang shugs kyis bsgrubs pa'i
112a2(phal chen): sems kyi rgyud ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dma' ba can dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzung ba'am/ bzod par mi nus so/ /kye
112a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gnyis pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
112a4(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang nas
112a5(phal chen): kyang 'ongs pa med la gang du yang 'gro ba med de/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs chen pos char rab tu 'bab pa yang yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin
112a6(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin chen po char mngon par 'bab pa yang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med
112a7(phal chen): de| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs chen pos char mngon par 'bab pa yang yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo gsum
112b1(phal chen): pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o//
112b2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin chen po'i char mngon pa 'bab pa de dag ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis
112b3(phal chen): shes pa'am/ bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sprin chen po'i char de la
112b4(phal chen): sems dpas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen po'i char de la bltas pas mig 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dbang phyug chen po ni ma gtogs te/ de'i
112b5(phal chen): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis de la chung ngu na char pa'i thigs pa gcig kyang ma rig par mi 'bab bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
112b6(phal chen): pa de dag yang dag par 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa yang sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
112b7(phal chen): cad kyis shes pa'am bsam par mi nus te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char la sems pas mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
113a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ma gtogs te/ blo shin tu sbyangs pa'i mthu dang / shugs kyis de dag la chung ngu na tshig dang / yi
113a2(phal chen): ge 'ga' tsam yang ma rig par sems can gzhan gyis sems kyi rgyud la mi 'bab po/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo bzhi pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa'
113a3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
113a4(phal chen): gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin chen po'i char de dag 'bab pa'i nang na/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni me'i phung po de rab
113a5(phal chen): tu zhi bar byed do/ /'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de las chu'i phung po de dag 'byung ngo / /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i
113a6(phal chen): char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni chu'i phung po de dag yongs su gcod do/ /yongs su bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni nor bu rin po che mang po yongs su 'grub
113a7(phal chen): par byed do/ /rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
113b1(phal chen): dag |de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba la'ang / rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni
113b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams
113b3(phal chen): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'byung bar byed do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad
113b4(phal chen): kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod do/ /yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rin po che
113b5(phal chen): yongs su grub par byed do/ /rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sprin chen po'i char 'bab pa yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa rnam par 'byed do/ /kye rgyal
113b6(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo lnga pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
113b7(phal chen): rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ char sprin chen po yang ro gcig la/ chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ de
114a1(phal chen): ltar rnam pa tshad med par tha dad pa'i char rnam par phye ba 'bab bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
114a2(phal chen): po'i char sprin ro gcig pa las/ de ltar tshad med cing rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi char sna tshogs 'bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yongs su 'byung ngo / /chos rnam par
114a3(phal chen): phye ba tshad med pa yang snang zhing yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo drug pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs
114a4(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum
114a5(phal chen): gyi stong chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ thog ma nyid du gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu
114a6(phal chen): 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu mi rnams kyi gnas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de ma
114a7(phal chen): yin pa'i sems can lhag ma gzhan rnams kyi gnas rnam par phye ba sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par
114b1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i tshe yang / thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung ngo / /de'i 'og tu nyan thos
114b2(phal chen): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan gyi 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes pa'i rgyud rnams 'byung bar
114b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar dper na/ char sprin chen po yang ro gcig la/ chu'i phung po yang rnam par mi rtog pa las/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pas
114b4(phal chen): gzhal med khang rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin ro gcig pa las/ sems can gyi snod
114b5(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa yod cing snang bar gyur to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo bdun pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa'
114b6(phal chen): sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan
114b7(phal chen): yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chus 'jig pa'i bskal pa chen po 'byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangs chen mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i tshe/ chos nyid
115a1(phal chen): thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i yon tan rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i pad+mo mang po 'byung ste/ de dag gis ni chu'i bskal pa thams
115a2(phal chen): cad kun nas khebs so/ /de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/ pad+mo de dag byung ba dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs
115a3(phal chen): kyi lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyis kyang bskal pa 'di la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba khong du chud do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
115a4(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'grub pa'i tshe/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag cing 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni gzugs la spyod pa'i lha
115a5(phal chen): rnams kyi gzhal med khang yongs su gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag cing dang la 'od gsal bas rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i
115a6(phal chen): bu rnams kyi lha'i gzhal med khang yongs su 'god do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gcig tu sdug cing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni khor yug dang / khor yug chen po'i ri rnams
115a7(phal chen): yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyad par du 'phags zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni ri rab ri'i rgyal po yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor brtan pa
115b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni rin chen po bcu yongs su gzhog pa byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ seng ldeng can dang / drang srong ri dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las shin tu rgyal dang /
115b2(phal chen): gnya' shing 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad can dang / kha ba can no/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ldang ste /
115b3(phal chen): de ni sa chen po kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni sa bla'i lha dang / klu dang / dri za'i khyim kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi
115b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung gi dkyil
115b5(phal chen): 'khor rnam par snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rin po che'i rigs thams cad kun nas gnas par byed do/ /rlung
115b6(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba brtan pa zhes bya ba ldang ste/ de ni yid bzhin gyi shing thams cad kun nas gnas par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar char sprin chen po'i char ro gcig
115b7(phal chen): tu 'bab pa dang / chu'i phung po rnam par mi rtog pa las chos nyid thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tha dad pa'i khyad par gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yod
116a1(phal chen): cing snang ngo / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad par gyur pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal
116a2(phal chen): ba'i sras dag / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad shin tu bsags pa/ bla na med pa'i ye
116a3(phal chen): shes chen po snang ba la mngon du gyur pa rnams 'byung ba'i tshe/ ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba
116a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa 'byung ste/ 'od zer des ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
116a5(phal chen): cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'dis yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
116a6(phal chen): dag |de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'byung ba'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od
116a7(phal chen): zer chen po 'od bzang po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes zag pa med cing / mi zad pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur
116b1(phal chen): ro| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings su
116b2(phal chen): gzhol ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer
116b3(phal chen): des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs mi sgul ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po zil gyis mi non cing / yang dag par
116b4(phal chen): 'phags pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
116b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes thams cad du brjod pa las 'das
116b6(phal chen): shing | thams cad du thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po sprul pas mngon par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od
116b7(phal chen): zer des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pa dang / de dang 'grogs pa don yod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za ba'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
117a1(phal chen): shes kyi 'od zer chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes
117a2(phal chen): mi zad pa'i tshogs 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po 'jug par dka' ba zhes bya ba
117a3(phal chen): 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod cing / ye shes zab mo thugs su chud pa yang dag par 'grub
117a4(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer chen po rgyan sna tshogs can zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes mtshan
117a5(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dga' bar 'gyur ba yang dag par 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi 'od
117a6(phal chen): zer chen po tshe mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes sangs rgyas kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
117a7(phal chen): gtugs par sku tshe'i tshad rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i char sprin chen
117b1(phal chen): po ro gcig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid
117b2(phal chen): thob pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer
117b3(phal chen): rang bzhin gcig pa las rnam pa tha dad du gyur pa yod cing snang ngo / /ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang dag par 'grub pa
117b4(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa yang yod cing snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par phye ba'i ro gcig pa las/ yon tan rnam pa tha dad pa'i
117b5(phal chen): rgyan tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du shes par 'gyur ba la ltos /kye rgyal ba'i
117b6(phal chen): sras dag / de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis ma brlabs na/ sems can sngon chad de bzhin gshegs
117b7(phal chen): pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la chung ngu na cha shas gcig tsam bstan pa yang shes par 'gyur ba'am/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i gnas
118a1(phal chen): med skabs med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'i khyad par gyis sems can rnams de
118a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i mthu la 'jug cing rtog pa dang khong du chud par byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa mi mnga'/ rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste /
118a3(phal chen): 'byung ba med cing kun nas 'byung ba med la yang dag par 'grub pa med de/ bya ba med cing de la byed pa su la'ang med mod kyi/ yang dag par 'byung ba'i grangs su bgrang ba yang yod
118a4(phal chen): do| |kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo brgyad pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
118a5(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chu'i phung po'i 'dzin pa bzhi
118a6(phal chen): ni| nam mkha' la gnas shing ldang ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor brtan pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor mi nyams
118a7(phal chen): pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dag ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhi ni rab tu lding zhing chu'i phung po 'dzin te/ chu'i phung po la gnas pa'i sa
118b1(phal chen): chen po ni mi 'jig / rnam par mi 'jig pas de'i phyir sa ni chu la gnas so/ /chu ni rlung la gnas so/ /rlung ni nam mkha' la gnas so/ /nam mkha' ni mi gnas pa zhes bya ste/
118b2(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni tshul de lta bur gnas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs
118b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa la gnas pa bzhi ldang ste/ de dag ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /bzhi
118b4(phal chen): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po bsdu bas sems can yongs su dga' bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil
118b5(phal chen): 'khor chen po chos rnam par dgod pa la 'gro ba mos par byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su srung ba zhes bya ba dang / ye
118b6(phal chen): shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor ba thams cad zag pa med pa'i dbyings su khong du chud pa zhes bya ba dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bzhi po de dag ni shes rab kyi snang ba
118b7(phal chen): chags pa med pa la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams te/ de dag ni 'gro ba thams cad byams pa chen pos yongs su bskyab pa dang / thugs rje chen pos
119a1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol zhing gzung ba'i phyir ldang ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
119a2(phal chen): 'gro ba mang po rnam par phye ba 'byams klas pa'i nang na/ thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa'i byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
119a3(phal chen): dag |de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ni tshul de lta bur 'grub cing de ltar gnas pa yin te/ shes rab kyi snang ba chags pa med pa ni mi gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
119a4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dgu pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
119a5(phal chen): rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa ni/ tshad
119a6(phal chen): med pa'i sems can rnams yongs su spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ 'di ltar chu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang gnas kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ sems
119a7(phal chen): can sa'i steng na 'khod pa rnams kyang sa'i steng na yod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyang gzhal med khang gis nye bar 'tsho
119b1(phal chen): yin/ nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyang bar snang gi gnas kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par grub pa yang rnam pa
119b2(phal chen): tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ 'di ltar mthong bar dga' ba dang / dad cing mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas mthong bas nye bar 'tsho ba
119b3(phal chen): yin| tshul khrims kyi stobs kyi mthu la gnas pa rnams kyang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang / 'phags
119b4(phal chen): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par shes pas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ chos kyi sgo snang ba la gnas pa rnams kyang rgyu chud mi za bas nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ snang ba med pa la gnas pa rnams
119b5(phal chen): kyang | chos 'byams klas pa chud mi za bas nye bar 'tsho ba yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par grub pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhes bya'o/ /kye
119b6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo rnam pa bcu pa 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
119b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba khong du chud par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa
120a1(phal chen): ni de lta bur shes par bya ste/ spyod pa yongs su bsgrubs pa tshad med pas na/ tshad med par shes par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
120a2(phal chen): pas na/ shin tu yangs par shes par bya'o/ /skye ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas dang bral bas na/ len pa med cing 'dor ba med par shes par bya'o/ /sems dang / yid dang / rnam
120a3(phal chen): par shes pa dang bral bas na/ rgyu ba med cing rgyu ba dang bral bar shes par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu yin pas na/ lus med par shes par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
120a4(phal chen): la bdag med pas na/ mnyam par shes par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la zad mi shes pa'i zhing du gyur pas na/ mi zad par shes par bya'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par
120a5(phal chen): rgyun mi 'chad pas na/ phyir mi ldog par shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la gnyen po med pas na/ mi 'phrogs par shes par bya'o/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus
120a6(phal chen): ma byas mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pas na/ mi gnyis par shes par bya'o/ /sngon yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad
