207b4(phal chen): phyin pa 'thob bo/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba yin gyi/ da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/ /bdag ni dngos
207b5(phal chen): po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin gyi/ da dung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
207b6(phal chen): mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyi/ da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/ /bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen
207b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyi/ da dung gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs
208a1(phal chen): phyin pa 'thob bo/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par zhugs pa yin gyi/ da dung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
208a2(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
208a3(phal chen): dbugs phyin pa 'thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag
208a4(phal chen): go |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams
208a5(phal chen): ni| sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi
208a6(phal chen): khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /bskal pa mnyam pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /gnas med pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su
208a7(phal chen): smin par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par
208b1(phal chen): bsten pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul
208b2(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang / tshul gyis 'jig rten du spyod pa sna tshogs kyis kyang /
208b3(phal chen): sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste/ de dag gis
208b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pa dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/
208b5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad
208b6(phal chen): la phan par dga' bas rnam par lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la
208b7(phal chen): nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas
209a1(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad las phyir phyogs su mi lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims
209a2(phal chen): dang / dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
209a3(phal chen): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
209a4(phal chen): rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
209a5(phal chen): snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rgyud las lung bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi skyo ba ni/
209a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o/ /bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan
209a7(phal chen): tan du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa
209b1(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par gsog cing sgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /sems can thams
209b2(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par brtson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa ni/
209b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /sngon gyi byang chub
209b4(phal chen): kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ lung bstan pa
209b5(phal chen): de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang
209b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
209b7(phal chen): la 'jug pa dang / bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhing gi rgyan la 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
210a1(phal chen): 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems
210a2(phal chen): dpa' la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
210a3(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la 'jug
210a4(phal chen): pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i
210a5(phal chen): sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
210a6(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang
210a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
210b1(phal chen): 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gyi spyod pa dang
210b2(phal chen): bsam pa la 'jug pa de dag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la rab tu 'jug go /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams
210b3(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
210b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa
210b5(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
210b6(phal chen): pa'i bag chags dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus dang / dus ma yin par yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod pa
210b7(phal chen): la 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
211a1(phal chen): sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
211a2(phal chen): khams la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rnam par dag par 'jug
211a3(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chung ngur 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chen por 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rdul shin tu phra mor tshud
211a4(phal chen): par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rab tu phra bar 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la yangs par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la 'byung bar
211a5(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas dang bcas par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas med par 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
211a6(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la
211a7(phal chen): 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
211b1(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad la rab tu 'jug go / bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa la
211b2(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / grangs yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs yod pa grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / grangs med pa
211b3(phal chen): grangs yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thams cad la bskal pa gcig tu 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thams
211b4(phal chen): cad la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams te/ de dag gis byang chub sems
211b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams bskal pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/ de dag gis byang
211b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum shin tu ston to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa dang /
211b7(phal chen): 'das pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la
212a1(phal chen): mi zad par bstan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus
212a2(phal chen): la mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la dus gsum skad cig tu bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum
212a3(phal chen): bstan pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum ston par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus
212a4(phal chen): gsum la 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar brda la 'jug pa dang / tshig gi lam la 'jug pa dang / mngon par brjod pa la 'jug pa dang / gdags pa la 'jug pa dang / 'du
212a5(phal chen): shes la 'jug pa dang / legs par bsngags pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / mi zad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhi ba la 'jug pa dang / dben pa la 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal
212a6(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum la 'jug pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go /
212a7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas
212b1(phal chen): thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya bas mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas mi skyo zhing / yongs su
212b2(phal chen): sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad mnyan pa la mi skyo
212b3(phal chen): zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad bstan pa la mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
212b4(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par
212b5(phal chen): bya bas mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'jig rten gyi khams re rer byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
212b6(phal chen): spyod pas mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du rjes su spyod pas mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med
212b7(phal chen): pas sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par bya ba dang / yang dag par lta ba la mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /kye rgyal
213a1(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi skyo zhing / yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag la gnas
213a2(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su skyo ba med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag
213a3(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / dbang po kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / las
213a4(phal chen): dang rnam par smin pa kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / skye ba kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu dbye ba'i ye
213a5(phal chen): shes dang / sangs rgyas kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / chos kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / dus gsum kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang / tshig gi rgyud thams cad la ngag gi lam
213a6(phal chen): kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
213a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po kun tu dbye ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs
213b1(phal chen): te| bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi brjed par 'dzin pa'i phyir thos pa'i gzungs dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir chos khong du chud pa'i gzungs
213b2(phal chen): dang / chos kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i gzungs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir chos snang ba rab tu
213b3(phal chen): 'thob pa'i gzungs dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos mngon du thos pa yongs su mi zad pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang / sgra skad dang /
213b4(phal chen): tha snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
213b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ston pa'i phyir dus gsum gyi gzungs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shin tu ston pa'i phyir rnam pa sna
213b6(phal chen): tshogs su spobs pa'i gzungs dang / sangs rgyas byung ba brjod du med pa thams cad du rna ba'i dbang pos khyer bar byed pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i
213b7(phal chen): gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi bsnyengs pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzungs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag
214a1(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/ de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson par bya ba dag go /kye
214a2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par byang chub
214a3(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas dang / smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang / las rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byin gyis brlabs kyi sangs rgyas dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
214a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs rgyas dang / sems kyi sangs rgyas dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas dang / rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang / bsam pa ji lta ba'i sangs rgyas so/ /
214a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
214a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa
214a7(phal chen): chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa de
214b1(phal chen): ni ci bdog pa yongs su gtong ba'i phyir gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par mos pas
214b2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis
214b3(phal chen): brgyan pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du nyams par mi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag
214b4(phal chen): par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan gyi ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smos pa'i ngag dang / tshig bzod pa'i phyir ri bo chen po'i dbang po dam pa lta
214b5(phal chen): bu'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin pa chen pos sdud pa'i phyir bde bar byed pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la
214b6(phal chen): mkhas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rtogs par khong du chud pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu
214b7(phal chen): bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i ye shes khong du chud pas mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag
215a1(phal chen): go |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i
215a2(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu
215a3(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la dgod pa ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang
215a4(phal chen): dag par bsags pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /byang chub sems
215a5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang pa'i
215a6(phal chen): spyod pa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skye ba gzung ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /chos thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la
215a7(phal chen): mkhas par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i
215b1(phal chen): smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te/ de dag gis smon cing mngon
215b2(phal chen): par brtson par byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ //bam po bdun
215b3(phal chen): cu drug pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
215b4(phal chen): sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mgon med pa rnams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sems
215b5(phal chen): can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa
215b6(phal chen): dang / yun ring po nas gnyid kyi brgyal ba'i sems kyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i
215b7(phal chen): snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bcing bas glags pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / srid pa'i grangs chen mtshor
216a1(phal chen): rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la
216a2(phal chen): rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
216a3(phal chen): chos las shin tu 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
216a4(phal chen): rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
216a5(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
216a6(phal chen): can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul bar bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par
216a7(phal chen): bzlog pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sems can thams cad kyi
216b1(phal chen): mi shes pa bsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te/ /sangs
216b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sangs
216b3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug
216b4(phal chen): cing khong du chud par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen
216b5(phal chen): to| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/ rkyen de dag gis byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye bar 'gyur
216b6(phal chen): ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
216b7(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang /
217a1(phal chen): bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
217a2(phal chen): 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang / dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang / ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du nan tan du bya ba'i sems dang / yid mi 'byung ba'i sems dang / ji snyam yang mi byed
217a3(phal chen): pa'i sems dang / gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / smon lam gcig pa'i sems dang / ston pa'i sems
217a4(phal chen): dang / spyod pa mtshungs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so/ /de sems
217a5(phal chen): bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe/ yongs su dag pa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
217a6(phal chen): sems can ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa dang / sgra skad dang / tha snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil
217a7(phal chen): 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad dang
217b1(phal chen): bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / sngon bskal ba mnyam par spyad
217b2(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad spangs pas rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par smin
217b3(phal chen): pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa
217b4(phal chen): yongs su dag pa ste/ yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bcu gang zhe
217b5(phal chen): na| 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
217b6(phal chen): bzod pa'i stobs kyi bsam pa mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir
217b7(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya
218a1(phal chen): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongs
218a2(phal chen): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad
218a3(phal chen): la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag la gnas
218a4(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
218a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
218a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la gcig pa dang / tha dad par yang dag par
218a7(phal chen): gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ma
218b1(phal chen): lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
218b2(phal chen): khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du
218b3(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa
218b4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu
218b5(phal chen): po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba
218b6(phal chen): 'thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
218b7(phal chen): cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
219a1(phal chen): thams cad la tshul gcig tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshul tha dad par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang /
219a2(phal chen): sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems
219a3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams
219a4(phal chen): cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs thams
219a5(phal chen): cad rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i byin gyi rlabs rtogs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
219a6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal
219a7(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs
219b1(phal chen): dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs
219b2(phal chen): dang / chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
219b3(phal chen): thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
219b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la zab par yid ches pas mi spangs pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems las mi ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi
219b5(phal chen): shugs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
219b6(phal chen): stobs bcu bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
219b7(phal chen): can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad la mnyam pa
220a1(phal chen): nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa
220a2(phal chen): nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
220a3(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na
220a4(phal chen): med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
220a5(phal chen): ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam mo/ /chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni brten pa tsam mo/ /chos thams cad ni las
220a6(phal chen): dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni don dam pa'o//
220a7(phal chen): chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ste/ de dag la gnas shing
220b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
220b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar zab mo'i chos bstan pa dang / yangs pa'i chos bstan pa dang / sna tshogs kyi chos bstan pa dang / thams cad
220b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa'i chos bstan pa
220b4(phal chen): dang / dus gsum dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i chos bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs par rab tu brjod
220b5(phal chen): pa'i chos bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i
220b6(phal chen): chos bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa
220b7(phal chen): rnams kyi chos bstan pa chen po bla na med pa ston par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
221a1(phal chen): 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzungs pa'i chos bstan pa
221a2(phal chen): rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / dpe dang mthun par bstun pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi tshul dang sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / gzungs thams cad
221a3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / the tshom thams cad yongs su gcod pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad
221a4(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad yongs
221a5(phal chen): su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / byin gyi rlabs rnams yongs su gzung ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang
221a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su gzung ba bla na med pa
221a7(phal chen): 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la rnam par ma brtags
221b1(phal chen): pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du snang ba'i
221b2(phal chen): spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la mun pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
221b3(phal chen): 'jog pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshig gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang / chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang
221b4(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/ de dag la
221b5(phal chen): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni /byang chub
221b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing / 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / chos thams cad snang ba rab tu
221b7(phal chen): thob pa'i dbang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang dang / ye shes chen po'i dbang dang / mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang
222a1(phal chen): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dbang dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / bdud thams cad shin tu
222a2(phal chen): pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub nam 'dod pa na
222a3(phal chen): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
222a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbang bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
222a5(phal chen): rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / chos thams cad
222a6(phal chen): la mi gnas pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / smon lam
222a7(phal chen): thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas
222b1(phal chen): pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems yangs par bsgyur
222b2(phal chen): ba yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
222b3(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bsod nams thams cad bsags pa la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba thams cad la sems
222b4(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi ris thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi las rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /
222b5(phal chen): chos la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa
222b6(phal chen): la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa'i rnam par rtogs pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa la
222b7(phal chen): 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do/ /kye rgyal ba'i
223a1(phal chen): sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin
223a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i thugs mnyam pa nyid rgya che zhing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon
223a3(phal chen): par bsgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs
223a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs
223a5(phal chen): pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang / snrel zhing rgyu ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par
223a6(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / chos thams cad gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'byams klas par rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub
223a7(phal chen): pa dang / lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'du shes kyis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi
223b1(phal chen): rnam pa'i 'du shes dang / rlom sems khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi rgyud thams cad la 'byung ba gcig gis mthar thug par
223b2(phal chen): 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs
223b3(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dus gsum du 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa
223b4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa
223b5(phal chen): ste| de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang la yang mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
223b6(phal chen): rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can sprul pa dang / lus sprul pa dang / zhing sprul pa dang / mchod pa sprul pa dang / dbyangs sprul pa dang / spyod pa dang smon
223b7(phal chen): lam sprul pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba sprul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sprul pa dang / chos bstan pa sprul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs
224a1(phal chen): sprul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos
224a2(phal chen): thams cad sprul pa yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/
224a3(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs
224a4(phal chen): dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / spyod yul gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dge ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i
224a5(phal chen): sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i
224a6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu dbugs phyin par rab tu rnyed pa
224a7(phal chen): bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar
224b1(phal chen): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la
224b2(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro bla na med pa bya'o/ /mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bla na med pa bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /bdag gis de bzhin
224b3(phal chen): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod nas kyang gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar
224b4(phal chen): byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang / man ngag bstan pa mdzad kyi/ gdams ngag dang man ngag de yang bdag gis bsam pa thag
224b5(phal chen): pas rim gror byas te/ mnyan la yang dag par nan tan du bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
224b6(phal chen): sems te/ bdag bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral bar
224b7(phal chen): 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
225a1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ ngan song
225a2(phal chen): gi 'jigs pa'am/ 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rung ste/ ji snyed kyi 'jigs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur/ ring du byas par gyur/ rnam
225a3(phal chen): par bcil bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu cis kyang mi 'jigs par gyur to/ /mi dngang bar gyur to/ /skyi g.ya' ba med par gyur to/ /cis kyang 'jigs par mi
225a4(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyi g.ya' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang / mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol
225a5(phal chen): ba thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur to zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/
225a6(phal chen): bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o/ /rab
225a7(phal chen): tu dgod par bya'o/ /de dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang
225b1(phal chen): ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim gros mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan
225b2(phal chen): las 'das nas kyang / sku gzugs la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang po bya'o/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/ /de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang
225b3(phal chen): yongs su bzung ba bla na med pas yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
225b4(phal chen): bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya/ spud par bya/ klubs par bya/ yongs su sbyang bar bya/ mnyam par bya/ bsgyur bar bya/ byin gyis
225b5(phal chen): brlab par bya/ bskyod par bya/ snang bar bya/ rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul bas dgang bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang
225b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par bya'o/ /nem nur gcad par bya'o/ /bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /sems khong du
225b7(phal chen): chud par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par bya'o/ /ngan song gi sgo gcad par bya'o/ /bde pa'i las kyi sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /mun pa rnam par bsal bar bya'o/ /'od kyis snang bar
226a1(phal chen): bya'o/ /bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi las rnams rab tu gdul bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob pa 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par
226a2(phal chen): bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu bskyed par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
226a3(phal chen): bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni don yod pa ste/ ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar
226a4(phal chen): 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
226a5(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ u dum wa ra'i me tog lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyan pa yang rgyun mi
226a6(phal chen): 'chad par 'gyur te/ de ltar bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ sems bskyed pa g.yo thams cad yongs su spangs pa drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa sgyu'i rnam pa med
226a7(phal chen): pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan
226b1(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
226b2(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo / /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang / 'gro ba thams cad re
226b3(phal chen): rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su bstan par bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bar bya'o/ /chos kyi
226b4(phal chen): sprin gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par spel
226b5(phal chen): pa'i smon lam chen pos/ chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i bskal par chos bstan par bya'o/ /'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus la dub pa med par
226b6(phal chen): 'gyur| ngag dang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
226b7(phal chen): dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bla na med
227a1(phal chen): par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnams te/ bcu
227a2(phal chen): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa de dang
227a3(phal chen): de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa dang / 'jig rten
227a4(phal chen): gyi khams yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa gang ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
227a5(phal chen): thams cad du da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di ni /
227a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ /sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa lnga
227a7(phal chen): pa'o| / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
227b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba shes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
227b2(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa shes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
227b3(phal chen): s ras| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas shing nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
227b4(phal chen): zhing rab tu shes so/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu shes so/ /chos bstan pa rab tu shes so/ /sems can 'dul ba rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi yang rab tu
227b5(phal chen): shes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi chos
227b6(phal chen): rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rab tu shes so/ /chos de dag la'ang rnam par mi
227b7(phal chen): rtog pas rab tu zhugs nas rnam pa tha dad par ston te/ chos de dag kyang gzud pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su 'dzud do/ /chos rnams rnam par rtag tu med par yang shes
228a1(phal chen): la| chos de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du'ang rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/
228a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bcu ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
228a3(phal chen): ye shes chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
228a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang
228a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
228a6(phal chen): spyod do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dga' bar bya ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags
228a7(phal chen): pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang
228b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa
228b2(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya
228b3(phal chen): pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
228b4(phal chen): spyad pa spyod do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
228b5(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas su bya ba rnams te/ gnas de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /
228b6(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sgrib pa'i las thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i
228b7(phal chen): phyir| sems brten pa bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi brtan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa
229a1(phal chen): dang / bdud thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i phyir/ sems brten pa bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog thams cad la mi lta ba'i phyir/ sems brtan
229a2(phal chen): pa bskyed pa dang / mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim
229a3(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang /
229a4(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang /
229a5(phal chen): chos zab mo rnam par bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis sa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang
229a6(phal chen): brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas mi skyo ba'i rgyud du bya ba'i phyir/ sems brtan pa bskyed pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
229a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po brtan
229b1(phal chen): zhing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams
229b2(phal chen): cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gnyis med la/ som nyi med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
229b3(phal chen): sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad sbyin pas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang /
229b4(phal chen): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o snyam yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/
229b5(phal chen): the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
229b6(phal chen): sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang ji snyed du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyes par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing /
229b7(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba'i sems bskyed pas mnyes par bya'o snyam yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di
230a1(phal chen): ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed
230a2(phal chen): de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan gyis yongs su rgyas par dgang ngo snyam yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid
230a3(phal chen): gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
230a4(phal chen): dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa'i mur thug par mi skyo ba'i rgyud kyis sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi khams
230a5(phal chen): grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ tshad med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang
230a6(phal chen): brjod du med pa/ grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad bla na med pa'i yongs su smin par
230a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i rnam par gdul bas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par gdul bar bya'o snyam na yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/
230b1(phal chen): the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
230b2(phal chen): bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes nas/ de la nem nur med cing / yid gnyis med pa dang / the tshom med
230b3(phal chen): par gnas pa yin te/ 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste/ bdag byang chub sems
230b4(phal chen): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pas/ chos thams cad mngon du gyur par 'gyur ro snyam yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur
230b5(phal chen): med/ yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
230b6(phal chen): dpa' 'di snyam ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su mos par bya'o snyam yang / de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur
230b7(phal chen): snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan
231a1(phal chen): yang byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo thams cad chags pa thams cad mi dmigs pas rab tu shes shing / de la nem nur med/
231a2(phal chen): yid gnyis med/ the tshom med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid la gnas pa 'di ni/ nem nur thams
231a3(phal chen): cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rab tu spangs pa dang / blang ba
231a4(phal chen): med cing dor ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su shes te/ de la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing nem nur med/ yid gnyis med la/ the tshom med pa yin
231a5(phal chen): te| 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'du shes kyi phyin ci
231a6(phal chen): log thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i sems skad cig gcig gi ye shes gcig dang / gnyis su mi dmigs pa bgrang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas la shin tu
231a7(phal chen): gzhol ba/ brjod pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa/ spyod yul brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam yang /
231b1(phal chen): de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med/ yid gnyis med/ the tshom med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa bcu pa
231b2(phal chen): ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid
231b3(phal chen): gnyis med la som nyi med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
231b4(phal chen): dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsam gyis
231b5(phal chen): mi khyab pa yin/ smon lam thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
231b6(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi za zhing rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan
231b7(phal chen): y ang byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug pa smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi
232a1(phal chen): khyab pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mngal du 'gro ba dang / skye ba
232a2(phal chen): ba dang / gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / bdud
232a3(phal chen): 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad
232a4(phal chen): yongs su ston cing / snying rje chen po dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyi bar gyis yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa drug
232a5(phal chen): pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par sems bskyed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byin gyi rlabs
232a6(phal chen): kyang yang dag par ston la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub
232a7(phal chen): sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug / mtshan ma yod pa la mtshan ma med par 'jug /rtog pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston /rtog
232b1(phal chen): pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston/ dngos po med pa la dngos po yod par 'jug /dngos po yod pa la dngos po med par 'jug /mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med
232b2(phal chen): par ston/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa la brjod du yod par shes/ chos thams cad brjod du yod pa la brjod du med
232b3(phal chen): par shes te/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang sems dang mnyam par shes la/ sems kyang byang chub dang mnyam
232b4(phal chen): par shes te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems dang byang chub tu shes mod kyi/ de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med/ 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med/ lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur
232b5(phal chen): ba med de/ 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re zhing 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / yang dag
232b6(phal chen): pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed/ zag pa zad pa yin yang dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa zad par mi byed/ chos thams cad zag pa med par yang shes/ zag pa zad par yang shes/ zag pa 'gag par
232b7(phal chen): yang shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis 'jig rten gyi chos la rnam par
233a1(phal chen): mi rtog / 'jig rten gyi chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog /chos thams cad gzung ba med pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbyings su 'dzud la/ chos thams
233a2(phal chen): cad 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnyis su med par yang shes pa 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
233a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag
233a4(phal chen): go| |bam po bdun cu rtsa bdun pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
233a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems
233a6(phal chen): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam
233a7(phal chen): par smin par 'jug pa thams cad la dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba la
233b1(phal chen): dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i sgo'i mthar phyin pa la bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa ste/ 'di ni dgongs
233b2(phal chen): te bshad pa la mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud re re na yang / 'jig
233b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa rgyun mi 'chad cing mtshams med pa shes pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
233b4(phal chen): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad du phra ba dang / yangs pa'i 'jug pas yongs su 'jug pa thams cad gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
233b5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skye ba nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i bar du gzung ba rgyun chad pa med pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad
233b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar 'jug cing / sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par phye bar mthong ba 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal
233b7(phal chen): ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs
234a1(phal chen): par bya ba yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du smon lam phyir zlog par mi byed pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang
234a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang shes la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par yang ring du mi spong / de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba
234a3(phal chen): yang rgyun mi gcod/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yang dag par sdud cing / bskyed pa dang / skyong ba dang / brtan par byed pa dang /
234a4(phal chen): rnam pa gcig tu byed pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa dang / gcig tu 'byung bar byed pa dang / yongs su grub pa gcig tu byed pa 'di ni dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa
234a5(phal chen): bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
234a6(phal chen): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs te bshad pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
234a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar zhing thams cad du ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can gyi skye mched la 'jug par
234b1(phal chen): ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs
234b2(phal chen): su shes par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa mngon par 'du byed pa la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa
234b3(phal chen): dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas
234b4(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la
234b5(phal chen): mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug par ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
234b6(phal chen): rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du ye shes rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par
234b7(phal chen): 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shes
235a1(phal chen): pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas
235a2(phal chen): mthong ba thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bskal par gnas par mkhas pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus kyi rgyud kyi ting nge
235a3(phal chen): 'dzin dang / rnam par ldang ba mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad khong du chud par
235a4(phal chen): bya bas snyoms pa'i ye shes kyis mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems kyi skad cig gcig gi ye shes kyis 'jug
235a5(phal chen): pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gis ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag par blang ba la rab tu gnas shing
235a6(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod pa'i smon lam chen po'i ye shes mkhas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snyoms par 'jug
235a7(phal chen): pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i
235b1(phal chen): sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ril po rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ril gyis sems can dang / ril gyis zhing dang / ril gyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i
235b2(phal chen): 'gro ba dang / ril gyis bskal pa'i me dang / ril gyis chus 'jig pa dang / ril gyis sangs rgyas dang / ril gyis sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ril gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
235b3(phal chen): sku kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / ril gyis chos thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan pa dang / ril gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'o/ /kye rgyal
235b4(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ril po ste/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i ril
235b5(phal chen): po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig
235b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa'i
235b7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'jug pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam
236a1(phal chen): par thar pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / bdag 'jig
236a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du phyin par shes par bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
236a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus gcig tu shes par bya ba'i rnam
236a4(phal chen): par thar pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol ba dang / mi 'bral ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa'o/ /
236a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
236a6(phal chen): kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa rnams
236a7(phal chen): te| bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pa mngon par bsgrub
236b1(phal chen): pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems dang / spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su shes pa mngon par bsgrub
236b2(phal chen): pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig thogs pa med pas rnam par blta ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
236b3(phal chen): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon
236b4(phal chen): par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par lus yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
236b5(phal chen): khams brjod du med par sems skad cig gis 'gro ba mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyan
236b6(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / lus kyi rgyud brjod du med par sprul pa yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i
236b7(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar sems can gyi
237a1(phal chen): bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag
237a2(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par shes pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po bsgrub
237a3(phal chen): pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa'i
237a4(phal chen): nan tan byed par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam
237a5(phal chen): par smin pa mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dmigs pas dben zhing byed pa med pa la spros pa med pa'i sems rab tu zhi ba mngon par
237a6(phal chen): grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad la zhugs pas sems gcig la yang tha dad du dmigs shing / chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu'i
237a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi rig pa dang / dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par go bar bya bar mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig la
237b1(phal chen): dang / gnas thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa dang / mi skye ba la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa shes
237b2(phal chen): pa'i rig pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i yul thams cad rnam par bzlog pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
