267b3(phal chen): pa gcig la yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bskal par mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
267b4(phal chen): cad la yang mchod pa dang / rim gro bya'o zhes brtsam pa chen po rtsom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang thams cad kyi sku gdung la
267b5(phal chen): bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs dang / dril bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bdug spos dang / na bza' thams cad kyis mchod
267b6(phal chen): pa bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang mchod rten 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa brjod du med par khyab pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyis brgyan pa mang po
267b7(phal chen): byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par khyab pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /
268a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bstan pa
268a2(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos brjod pa la rgyun gcod cing / gtang ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes brtsam pa chen po rtsom pa dang /
268a3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig cing mtshungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
268a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes brtsam pa chen po rtsom pa dang / mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad
268a5(phal chen): du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bstan cing / bskal pa brjod du med par chos bstan kyang bdag gi lus la
268a6(phal chen): dub par mi 'gyur zhing ngag dang / sems la dub par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa chos dang ldan pa de bzhin
268a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos kyis brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don du smon lam chen po btab pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba snying rje chen po'i mthar
268b1(phal chen): thug pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi gzhis gtugs pa/ bden pa'i tshig la gnas pa/ chos thams cad kyis dben pa mngon du byas pa/ sems can thams cad mi dmigs
268b2(phal chen): pa| las dang bya ba mi 'gal ba/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam
268b3(phal chen): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol ba/ 'jug pa dang / ldog pa med par yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa
268b4(phal chen): dang | smon lam chen po dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las chen po sgrub bo zhes brtsam pa chen po rtsom pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
268b5(phal chen): rnams kyi brtsam pa chen po rtsom pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po phun sum tshogs pa bla na med pa 'thob
268b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin
268b7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsrung ba la
269a1(phal chen): brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad btsal ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang /
269a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtsams pa chen
269a3(phal chen): po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa thams cad khong du
269a4(phal chen): chud par bya ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang /
269a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa dang / chos thams cad mnyan
269a6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba la brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par byed pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
269a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes
269b1(phal chen): chen po brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa mi phyed
269b2(phal chen): pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams
269b3(phal chen): cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad
269b4(phal chen): la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la dad pa mi
269b5(phal chen): phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba byang
269b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa mtshams sbyar ba'i tshul la dad pa mi phyed pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa mi phyed pa
269b7(phal chen): ste| de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i dad pa mi phyed pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag
270a1(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mos pa drag pos rang gi rgyud la lung bstan pa dang /
270a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhol ba'i skabs kyis lung bstan pa dang / spyod pa rgya chen pos lung bstan pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa dang / gsang ste lung
270a3(phal chen): bstan pa dang / rang gi sems la rag las par khong du chud pas lung bstan pa dang / bzod pa thob pas lung bstan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyis lung
270a4(phal chen): bstan pa dang / bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad mi zad pas lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul bas lung bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal
270a5(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan
270a6(phal chen): pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag
270a7(phal chen): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang smon lam gcig pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa
270b1(phal chen): gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang bsam pa gcig pa phun sum tshogs par
270b2(phal chen): gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam par gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i
270b3(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams dang spyod pa gcig tu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar
270b4(phal chen): de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /phun sum tshogs
270b5(phal chen): par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang
270b6(phal chen): gcig cing mnyam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
270b7(phal chen): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang yid la bya ba gcig pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa
271a1(phal chen): gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang yongs su
271a2(phal chen): dag pa gcig pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /bdag gis
271a3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang gcig tu rnam par spyod pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa
271a4(phal chen): gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang gcig cing mnyam par 'jug pa yongs
271a5(phal chen): su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /bdag
271a6(phal chen): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang tha ma dang pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur cig / phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur
271a7(phal chen): bar de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur cig ces bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de dag la gnas
271b1(phal chen): shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
271b2(phal chen): rnams kyi ye shes khong du chud pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar gtong ba'i sems kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos
271b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / dris pa thams cad kyi the tshom
271b4(phal chen): gcod pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / don shes pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
271b5(phal chen): thams cad la yid ches par 'jug pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung yang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
271b6(phal chen): tshad med par 'gyur bar yid ches par byas shing / chos dkar po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
271b7(phal chen): spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med par 'gro zhing gnas
272a1(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba
272a2(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa dang / gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung sna tshogs la
272a3(phal chen): 'jug pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes khong du chud pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes khong du chud pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas
272a4(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni /byang chub
272a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus
272a6(phal chen): med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'jug pa la sems bskyed pha rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing dang / dus dang / chos kyi dbyings
272a7(phal chen): su 'jug pa las sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par lta ba la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus
272b1(phal chen): med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la rgya cher brtag pa la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
272b2(phal chen): cad yid la bya ba la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'jug pa la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha'
272b3(phal chen): dang dbus med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
272b4(phal chen): du 'jug pa la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings rnam par blta ba la sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha'
272b5(phal chen): dang dbus med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing
272b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po rgya mtsho lta bu bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i
272b7(phal chen): sras| bcu bo 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la bgrang bas sbyar ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la
273a1(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa'i gter dang / chos thams cad la gzung snang ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas rab
273a2(phal chen): tu snang ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas par khong du chud pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul thams
273a3(phal chen): cad la so sor rtog cing lta ba'i gter dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub par mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral
273a4(phal chen): ba'i gter dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
273a5(phal chen): dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa chen po rab tu rnyed pa'i gter ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ de dag la
273a6(phal chen): gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi gter bla na med pa 'thob pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba la brtson par byed
273a7(phal chen): pa dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi 'khrug
273b1(phal chen): mi 'khrul ba'i sdom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam pa'i sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsam pa rlabs po che'i sdom pa dang / dge ba'i
273b2(phal chen): bshes gnyen thams cad la bsam pa mi 'dor ba'i sdom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba thams cad la yongs su mi rgyu ba'i sdom pa dang / byang chub
273b3(phal chen): sems dpa' chud za ba'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i sdom pa dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sdom pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa thams cad
273b4(phal chen): mthar phyin par bya ba'i sdom pa dang / bdud thams cad rab tu pham par bya ba'i sdom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sdom pa'o/ /kye
273b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes chen po'i sdom pa bla na
273b6(phal chen): med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bskal pa brjod du
273b7(phal chen): med par tshe'i tshad byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa la nges par rtogs par gzhog cing / ye shes kyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la
274a1(phal chen): dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan rnam par dbye ba du mas rab tu brgyan par byin gyis brlab par ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad
274a2(phal chen): la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang
274a3(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar lta bas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ smon
274a4(phal chen): lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo dang / snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par
274a5(phal chen): ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi bsnyengs pa skad cig skad cig tu go bar yongs su ston pas/ ye shes la dbang ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
274a6(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi mnga'i pha rol
274a7(phal chen): tu phyin pa ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul
274b1(phal chen): ba rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / las la rnam par 'phrul
274b2(phal chen): ba dang / smon lam la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / spyod yul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu
274b3(phal chen): 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
274b4(phal chen): sras| de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can la rnam par 'phrul ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can la
274b5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad sems can med pas sgrol ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam
274b6(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can thams cad la dus la bab na chos ston pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams
274b7(phal chen): cad du sprul pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbubs gcig tu btsud kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can
275a1(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams su byin gyis brlabs te/ pha rol shes par byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
275a2(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad du brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i dbang yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can gyi khams
275a3(phal chen): thams cad du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gyi khams
275a4(phal chen): thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob pa yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon
275a5(phal chen): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyi rgyan yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag
275a6(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing la rnam par
275a7(phal chen): 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad skra'i sbubs gcig tu 'dzud pa'i rnam
275b1(phal chen): par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad mi zad pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus gcig yongs su
275b2(phal chen): ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad rang gi lus su chud par yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad rab tu bskyod kyang / sems can
275b3(phal chen): 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba zhing gcig tu yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing gcig gis rnam par
275b4(phal chen): phye zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par phye bar yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig
275b5(phal chen): gis yongs su khyab par sems can thams cad la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing phra ba dang / che ba dang / yangs pa dang / rgya che ba dang / zab pa dang / snrel zhi dang /
275b6(phal chen): spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang / gzhi mnyam pa la 'jug par yongs su gzhol bas phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par phye ba la 'jug par sems can ma lus pa thams cad la yongs su ston
275b7(phal chen): ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
276a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad chos gcig tu yang dag par gzhol
276a2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / chos gcig po chos thams cad du yang dag par gzhol bar byed kyang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang mi 'gal bar rnam par 'phrul ba dang /
276a3(phal chen): chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sgrub par khong du chud par bya ba pha rol gyi go bar bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad 'du shes dang bral
276a4(phal chen): bar sems can mang pos khong du chud par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu 'jug cing tshul mtha' yas par ston pa'i rnam par
276a5(phal chen): 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad la brjod du med par 'jug cing / sgo brgya stong gi pha rol gyi rgyud du bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad sgo kun nas rgyu
276a6(phal chen): ba'i yi ge'i tshul la mkhas par rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig dang mi 'gal ba la 'jug pa'i tshul khong du chud par bstan pas bskal pa
276a7(phal chen): brjod du med cing mi zad pa rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa la sems can mang po gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams
276b1(phal chen): cad mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin cing mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sgyu ma'i dra ba rnam
276b2(phal chen): pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa med pas bskal pa mu med par mi zad par sems can la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
276b3(phal chen): rnams kyi chos la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
276b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyi rlob cing / mos par byed pa la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi 'du shes su byin gyi
276b5(phal chen): rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur mos shing / 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs
276b6(phal chen): rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi skur 'jug cing / gzhan la yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad du nam mkha' byin gyi rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba
276b7(phal chen): dang / dus gsum thams cad chos kyi sku gcig gis yongs su rgyas par sems can la ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / lus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
277a1(phal chen): bzhag cing lus mtha' yas pa las rnam par ldang ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / lus gcig gis mngon par sangs rgyas shing sems can
277a2(phal chen): snyed kyi lus su yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems
277a3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi lus chos kyi skur ston cing / chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
277a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/
277a5(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rang gi smon lam du byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
277a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi smon lam gyi stobs dang mthu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par yongs su ston par rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can ji ltar smin pa rang rang
277a7(phal chen): gi bsam pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa 'grangs pa mu
277b1(phal chen): med pa thams cad du smon lam gyi rgyun mi gcod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i lus las gyen du bskyod de/ ye shes kyi lus la'ang mi gnas pa'i smon
277b2(phal chen): lam la dbang bsgyur bas lus thams cad yongs su ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rang gi lus tshad du gyur bas pha rol gyi tshogs kyi smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs
277b3(phal chen): par bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa 'grangs pa thams
277b4(phal chen): cad byang chub kyi spyod pas rgyas par dgang ba'i smon lam rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / skra'i sbubs gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis
277b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyas par dgang zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ sems can gcig tu ston pa'i smon lam la rnam par
277b6(phal chen): 'phrul pa dang / chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi sprin chen po byung ba las chos bdud rtsi'i char rab
277b7(phal chen): tu 'bab cing / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i glog snang ba dang / yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra mngon par 'byung bas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs
278a1(phal chen): su ngoms par bya ba'i smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas rnam par rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de
278a2(phal chen): dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras /bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul la
278a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul dang yang ldan la sems can gyi khams
278a4(phal chen): kyi spyod yul du'ang snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon par dga' ba'ang yin la/ bdud kyi spyod yul
278a5(phal chen): la gnas par yang snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ 'khor ba'i spyod yul las
278a6(phal chen): kyang mi g.yo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi rgyud kyang
278a7(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can ma zhi ba/ rab
278b1(phal chen): tu ma zhi ba/ nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul can rnams kyang rnam par mi spong ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang /
278b2(phal chen): spro ba med pa dang / mi 'gro ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / rnam par mi dmigs pa dang / bar snang dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems
278b3(phal chen): can spros pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad du dmigs pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi gnas na yang snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stobs
278b4(phal chen): dang | rnam par thar ba'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ phyogs gcig pa'i spyod yul thams cad du yang snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems
278b5(phal chen): can med pa'i mtha'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba yang rnam par mi spong ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
278b6(phal chen): ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / rtogs pa dang / ye shes dben pa'i spyod yul dang yang ldan la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye bar yang snang ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i
278b7(phal chen): sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs dpa'i spyod pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / spyod yul thams cad kyang thob la/ nyan thos dang rang
279a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam dang / cho ga yang yongs su ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
279a2(phal chen): yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar tha dad pa yang
279a3(phal chen): dag par shes pa'i ye shes mi zad pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam shin tu rnam
279a4(phal chen): par gdon mi za ba bstan pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / khong du chud pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rang gi sems
279a5(phal chen): kyi ye shes pha rol gyi sems kyi ye shes dang sems gcig las sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo bar byed pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems
279a6(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad la gang dang 'byor ba'i sman yang dag par gtong ba'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul
279a7(phal chen): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs thams cad la chags
279b1(phal chen): ba med pa'i ye shes yangs pa sems can gzhan gyis thob par byed pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems kyi skad cig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gro
279b2(phal chen): pa thams cad du yongs su ston pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gcig gi 'du shes kyis sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang / bya ba la mngon sum du
279b3(phal chen): ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gcig gi sgra dbyangs kyis sgra thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su ston pa'i ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras /
279b4(phal chen): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par
279b5(phal chen): shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yongs su ston kyang / lus gcig tu dmigs pa'i mngon par shes pa la
279b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / chos bstan pa yongs su
279b7(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gcig gi sems la dmigs pas byang chub kyi rgyud brjod du med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams
280a1(phal chen): cad kyi sems kyis go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / dbyangs gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed
280a2(phal chen): cing | sgra rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad du shes par byed pas/ sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud du phyin par byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'gro ba
280a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis rjes su dran zhing shes pas/ las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du
280a4(phal chen): ston cing / sems can gyi go bar byed pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan par bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul
280a5(phal chen): ba dang / dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu spyod pa'i smon lam yang dag par bskyed
280a6(phal chen): ba dang / chos kyi snang ba rab tu dgye ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
280a7(phal chen): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
280b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs dpa'i stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba'i mngon par shes pa la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / kye
280b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ mdor na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par shes pas chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin te/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes
280b3(phal chen): pa la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
280b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig tu 'dzud pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam
280b5(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chu'i phung po chen po bsdu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs te/ chos kyi dbyings dang
280b6(phal chen): mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro yang sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rang gi
280b7(phal chen): lus su btsud de/ bya ba thams cad yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu bres te/
281a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang sems can rnams sdang bar mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang
281a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa bskal pa gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ bskal pa gcig la brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa 'du ba dang / 'jig pa ston kyang sems
281a3(phal chen): can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chus 'jig pa yongs su bstan pa dang / me dang rlung gis 'jig
281a4(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan kyang sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig cing chu dang / me dang rlung gis
281a5(phal chen): 'jig kyang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi sa yongs su gang bar byas shing sems can la kun tu ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
281a6(phal chen): khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa lag pa'i mthil gyis blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par bkod kyang / sems can la gnod par mi 'gyur
281a7(phal chen): ba'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yongs su bstan pas/ sems can gyis go bar byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul
281b1(phal chen): ba ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
281b2(phal chen): rnams kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba mi gtong bas sems can gyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / nam
281b3(phal chen): mkha' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad rgyan rnam par phye bas brgyan par yongs su ston pas zhing gi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad lus med
281b4(phal chen): par 'jug pas chos kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod pa rgyun mi spyod pas bskal pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa sangs par byed pas sangs
281b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad skyed cing rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir spyod pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can gyi
281b6(phal chen): khams thams cad yang dag par sgrol bas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / chos thams cad bdag po med par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ rang byung gi stobs la
281b7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sems can thams cad
282a1(phal chen): yongs su mi gtong bas/ snying rje chen po'i stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
282a2(phal chen): kyi stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sems can la rnam par 'phrul ba bzung ba man chad stobs la rnam par 'phrul ba yan chad kyi bar du/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang
282a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rnam par 'phrul ba bcu po de dag thob par gyur pa de ni/ 'dod na bla na
282a4(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mi 'dod na mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /'dod na mngon par 'tshang yang rgyal spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod do/ /
282a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam chen pos byung ba ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa'i
282a6(phal chen): phyir ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi lus la zhing
282a7(phal chen): gi lus byin gyis rlob pa byed kyang / sems can gyi lus 'byed par mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi lus la
282b1(phal chen): sems can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang / zhing gi lus 'dres par yang mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
282b2(phal chen): kyi sku la sems can gyi lus byin gyis rlob kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dma' bar mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyan
282b3(phal chen): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su ston kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed pa 'di ni/ rnam par rtse ba bzhi
282b4(phal chen): pa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i lus la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus yongs su ston kyang / spyod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa de ni rnam par rtse
282b5(phal chen): ba lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i lus la spyod pa yongs su ston kyang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
282b6(phal chen): pa nye bar len par yang mi byed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i rgyun
282b7(phal chen): yongs su ston kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par chags pa mi skyed pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la
283a1(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ston kyang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas shin tu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed pa 'di ni rnam par rtse ba brgyad pa'o/ /
283a2(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag bzhin du 'di lta ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su ston
283a3(phal chen): kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mnyam pa nyid 'khrug par mi byed pa 'di ni rnam par rtse ba dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi
283a4(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung nas chos thos nas/ lus kyang mi snang bar mi byed la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
283a5(phal chen): med pa gzhan dang gzhan du lus rnam par dgod pas ldang yang lus tha dad par yang mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos nyan
283a6(phal chen): cing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing kun chub par byed la/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / chos dri ba bzung ba'i rgyun kyang mi gsod de/ de de ltar mnyam par gzhag bzhin du lus
283a7(phal chen): mi snang bar yang mi byed la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang sgo mngon par sgrub pa re re las kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lus dang / sgo mngon par sgrub
283b1(phal chen): cing / de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa thams cad zad par gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par sgrub pa'i mtha' gang yang med pa de ni rnam par rtse ba bcu
283b2(phal chen): pa'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
283b3(phal chen): chen pos rnam par rol pa bla na med par thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
283b4(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug par sems can la yongs su ston pa'i yul dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / mngon par sgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis
283b5(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du/ sprul pa mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems
283b6(phal chen): dpa'i lus su mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub
283b7(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par sgrub pa dang / 'khor bar mya ngan las 'das pa mngon
284a1(phal chen): par sgrub pa'i yul dang / sems can gcig gi skad du brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan par mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / mtha'
284a2(phal chen): yas pa'i sgo nas lus kun tu ston cing / lus gcig tu byin gyis brlab pa dang / lus rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i yul dang / lus gcig gis chos kyi
284a3(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa'i skad cig re re la/ mtha' yas pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub cing / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i
284a4(phal chen): yul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul te/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
284a5(phal chen): shes chen po'i yul bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ //bam po brgyad cu pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs
284a6(phal chen): te| bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad dang 'du 'dzi med pa'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgyid lug pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ lhag
284a7(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sbyor ba'i stobs dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang
284b1(phal chen): spyod pa rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun chad
284b2(phal chen): pa med par bya ba'i spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa thams cad kyi 'byung bar kun tu bstan pa dang / theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir theg pa'i stobs dang / skra'i sbubs
284b3(phal chen): gcig tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang
284b4(phal chen): chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po ma lus pa lhag ma med pa
284b5(phal chen): mtha' dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i stobs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub
284b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
284b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sgra thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du/
285a1(phal chen): shar phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs nas/ ston pa la la zhig bdag gi gan du byon te/ 'gro ba chen po brgya stong rab tu bshad
285a2(phal chen): par gyur na/ bdag gis de gzung bar mi nus snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong bas/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam
285a3(phal chen): ba thob cing / brtan la zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ci 'dod pa de dris shig ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
285a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni yi ge dang / don brjod pa dang / sgra dang / skad thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba'i
285a5(phal chen): spobs pa thogs pa med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas la la zhig 'ongs
285a6(phal chen): te| bdag la chos kyi the tshom chen po zhig dris par gyur na/ bdag gis lan mi lon pa snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu yang rjes
285a7(phal chen): su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dri ba yongs su dri ba ci yod pa bstan pa dang / 'jigs shing spu ldang ba med par byos la gang 'dod
285b1(phal chen): pa de dag dris shig / ces skabs 'byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni stong pa'i chos khong du chud par rtogs pa yin te/
285b2(phal chen): bdag dang / bdag gi dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched du lta ba dang
285b3(phal chen): bral te/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su song ba de dag 'di snyam du bdag la la la zhig gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis gnod par bya ba'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur
285b4(phal chen): ba'am snyam du sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa
285b5(phal chen): dang bral ba'i phyir te/ mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong bas/ mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon du 'dor ba la rab tu brtan pa 'di ni
285b6(phal chen): mi 'jigs pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs te/ sangs rgyas kyi snang bas nye bar brtan cing /
285b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang / tshul la rab tu gnas la/ spyod lam rnam par ma brtags shing / ji lta bzhin du gnas pas/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag gi spyod
286a1(phal chen): lam la la la zhig gis brgal bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma yang
286a2(phal chen): rjes su mi mthong bas mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing / 'khor gyi nang du phyin nas chos ston pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
286a3(phal chen): ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid shin tu dag cing yongs su dag pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra dang / nges pa dang ldan zhing / ngan par spyod pa dang / ngan du byed pa dang / ngan du smra ba
286a4(phal chen): dang bral ba yin te/ de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las la la la zhig gis brgal bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du mi sems te/ byang chub sems dpas
286a5(phal chen): mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong bas/ 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob cing / sems can gzhan chos la sbyor ba byed pa
286a6(phal chen): 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lag na rdo rje rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs pas yongs su bsrung ba chen po thob cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
286a7(phal chen): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis rtag tu rim gror bya ba yin/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po rnams kyis rtag tu phyag bya ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
286b1(phal chen): cad kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag la bdud dam bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'am/ mu stegs can nam/ mu stegs spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dag gam/
286b2(phal chen): sems can dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa la la zhig 'ongs shing / bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ram zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
286b3(phal chen): mtshan ma yang rjes su ma mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / mi 'jigs pa'i dam pa chen po thob pas dga' zhing / yid bde ba dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i las thams cad la
286b4(phal chen): nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bsngags pa'i dran pa rab tu thob cing / dran pa'i dbang po mchog
286b5(phal chen): dang ldan pas yongs su rmongs pa med pa yin te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung
286b6(phal chen): pa la la zhig yongs su ma zin pa'am/ chud za par 'gyur zhing nub par gyur pa med dam zhes bya bar sems dpa' med de/ byang chub sems dpas mtshan ma yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mtshan ma yang rjes
286b7(phal chen): su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing mi 'jigs pa chen po'i dam pa thob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs
287a1(phal chen): pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes khong du chud par rtogs shing / byang chub sems
287a2(phal chen): dpa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog thob pas/ rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu smon lam dang / bsam pa
287a3(phal chen): chen po rab tu btang ste/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed nas ched du bsams te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas 'dod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa can du skye
287a4(phal chen): ba bzung zhing / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la rtse ba dang / 'khor gyi longs spyod chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du bdag gis yongs su gzung bar byed kyang / de dag 'di
287a5(phal chen): snyam du bdag cag sems can gyi 'du 'dzi'i gos pas yongs su gos par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
287a6(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / spobs pa'i bar chad dam| gcig tu mi 'gyur ram zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rgyu yang rjes su mi
287a7(phal chen): mthong ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang gi pha
287b1(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa dag ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrug pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ba rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
287b2(phal chen): rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kyi skye ba'i skye mched thams
287b3(phal chen): cad du skye ba gzung bar smon lam rab tu 'debs te/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal 'a sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma
287b4(phal chen): nyams shing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa dag ste/ de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi stobs dang
287b5(phal chen): shugs la gnas shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su ston kyang / de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag nyan thos sam/ rang
287b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ gcig gis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpas rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong bas
287b7(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas/ theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston cing /theg pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid
288a1(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pas dkar
288a2(phal chen): po'i chos yongs su 'dus pa yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu rten pa
288a3(phal chen): yin| byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul la mngon par dbang bskur ba
288a4(phal chen): yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ spyod pa nye bar blang ba de yang rgyun mi gcod de/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis/ sems can yang yongs su smin
288a5(phal chen): par ma gyur la/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ston par mi nus pa'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur ram zhes sems pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu yang rjes
288a6(phal chen): su mi mthong ngo / /rgyu yang rjes su mi mthong bas 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba
288a7(phal chen): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su ston te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi gcod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen pos skye ba yang rgyun mi gcod
288b1(phal chen): cing / byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod de/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi
288b2(phal chen): 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi 'jigs pa chen po bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa las kyang phyir ldog
288b3(phal chen): par mi 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
288b4(phal chen): sras| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing gtong ba yongs su gtong ba la 'jungs pa dang bral ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su
288b5(phal chen): dag la tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal ba yin/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs la bsam pa mi sgul pa yin/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan la dus thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa
288b6(phal chen): yin| shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i ye shes dang ldan la/ 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ shes rab kyis shin tu byung zhing sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral ba yin te /
288b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar ma bstan par pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang mthun pa 'di ni/
289a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos dang pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi khams yongs su sdud cing /
289a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i dang tshul can bzhin 'dzum pa/ snyan par smra ba/ tshig 'jam pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mngon
289a3(phal chen): par dga' ba/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi don khong du chud par byed pa/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med pa| sems can
289a4(phal chen): thams cad la snyoms par don du sems pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar ma bstan par sems can gyi khams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa de ni/ byang
289a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ de ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i lam dang mthun pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/ /kye
289a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul la mkhas shing / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song
289a7(phal chen): bar yongs su bsngo zhing / 'jig rten gyi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ye brngam pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas shing sems
289b1(phal chen): can gyi don du yongs su bsngo ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar ma bstan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ltar tshol zhing sems can
289b2(phal chen): gyi don yongs su tshol ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal
289b3(phal chen): ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing 'jig rten pa thams cad
289b4(phal chen): kyi lam la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan te/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul la mngon du bltas la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyir phyogs
289b5(phal chen): te| sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson zhing / bdag gi bde ba la chags pa med de/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
289b6(phal chen): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pas rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / 'khor bas
289b7(phal chen): yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan te/ 'khor ba la bza' shing gi ra ba lta bu'i 'du shes chen po thob pa dang / bdud kyi khyim thams cad na gnas pa dang /
290a1(phal chen): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten kyi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang chen po yongs su ston cing / skye ba'i skye mched thams
290a2(phal chen): cad du gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur la/ zhags pa 'thub pa'i rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi lta ba dang bral te/ 'jig rten pa'i rang bzo dang / sngags dang / gtsug
290a3(phal chen): lag dang / yi ge dang / shod thabs dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / rang gi rtsed mo dang / 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su ston cing / bud med kyi
290a4(phal chen): cho ga dang / mtshan ma dang / cha lugs dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyan pa dang /
290a5(phal chen): dpyad pa dang / dri ba dang / brtags pa shin tu bsten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa'i pha rol
290a6(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i mchog thob/ sems can thams cad kyi ngor blta ba dbang dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang / spyod lam yongs su ston pa/ theg
290a7(phal chen): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'tshang rgya ba skad cig skad cig tu ston pa spyod pa'i rgyun yongs su mi gcod pa ste/ kye rgyal
290b1(phal chen): ba'i sras/ de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang / bstan pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ 'di ni byang
290b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zung dang smrel zhi la mkhas shing ye shes kyi rnam par
290b3(phal chen): rtse ba dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas kyang 'khor ba'i sgo yongs su ston pa/ sems can med pa'i mtha'i
290b4(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan yang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ma btang ba shin tu dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang / nyon mongs pa'i
290b5(phal chen): 'bar ba sems can la yongs su ston pa/ chos kyi ye shes gcig tu stug pa'i lus dang ldan yang / sems can gyi sgo mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa/ bsam gtan
290b6(phal chen): chen po la bsam gtan 'cha' yang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhing longs spyod par sems can la rnam par ston pas gcig tu dga' bar dga'
290b7(phal chen): zhing mos pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad las phyir bltas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba/ rtag tu chos kyi dga' bas
291a1(phal chen): dga' zhing mos kyang / lha'i bu mo brgya phrag stong gi sgra rab tu phyung ba dang rtse ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / dge ba'i mchog
291a2(phal chen): brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan yang dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ston pa/ rtag tu kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba spyad kyang / sems
291a3(phal chen): can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba yang yongs su ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog
291a4(phal chen): thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus las gyen du ma g.yos pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye
291a5(phal chen): shes mu med pa dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par dka' na/ sems can byis pa gzhan
291a6(phal chen): gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lus dang /
291a7(phal chen): ngag dang / yid ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste/ las shin tu dag par spyod cing srog gcod pa dang bral ba nas/ sdig pa'i lta ba'i bar dang bral bas/
291b1(phal chen): byams pa phun sum tshogs shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang
291b2(phal chen): ldan pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
291b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis
291b4(phal chen): len par mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi sems can gyi don du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i
291b5(phal chen): sems dang ldan zhing / sems can gyi khams thams cad dgrol ba la zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhing yongs su longs spyod pa la chags
291b6(phal chen): pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po las dgrol ba la mngon par brtson pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar snying rje chen
291b7(phal chen): po'i stobs yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
292a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba ste/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
292a2(phal chen): gyi mgon po thams cad kyi phyag bya ba/ 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar smon pa/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
292a3(phal chen): sras| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan zhing / yongs su dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyis
292a4(phal chen): spyod pas| de'i phyir de dag mthong bas 'gro ba thams cad mi ngoms pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar mngon par dga' ba de
292a5(phal chen): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems
292a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brtan pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i go cha shin tu bgos pas de dag ji ltar nyon mongs shing / byis
292a7(phal chen): pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang ji ltar brten tam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po
292b1(phal chen): che bzang po 'od dang ldan pa de 'jig par mi byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba de chu dang bar byed
292b2(phal chen): pa ni| pad+mo'i rdzing bu ji ltar rnyogs kyang rung ste/ nang du btsug na nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing bzang ba de nyid rnam par mi spong ste/ chu de thams cad kyang
292b3(phal chen): rnyog pa med par rab tu dang bar byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang / byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzis ji ltar brten kyang / thams cad
292b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che 'od gsal zhing / snang ba bzang po de chud zos par mi byed de/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa de las zlog cing / thams
292b5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che 'od gsal zhing / snang ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar ji ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang rung / byis pa'i
292b6(phal chen): skye bo'i 'du 'dzin dang ji ltar brten tam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che de
292b7(phal chen): nyid 'jig par mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub
293a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gyi ye shes kyi chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa ste/ rang byung gi ye shes
293a2(phal chen): kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing / go 'phang skyon med pa la gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring du mi spong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la
293a3(phal chen): rim gror bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod de/ de ltar tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa las phyir mi ldog cing / de bzhin
293a4(phal chen): gshegs pa la rim gror bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal
293a5(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
293a6(phal chen): chos ma 'dres pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
293a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'i grogs thams cad dang /
293b1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu bya ba'i las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i las dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par
293b2(phal chen): yongs su bzung ba'i las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas mi g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi las dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od
293b3(phal chen): zer dgye ba'i 'od kyi las dang / pad+mo'i snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'khod pa yongs su bstan pa'i 'od zer gyi las dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
293b4(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bzung bas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i las dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing chos bstan pa dang / sems can gdul ba yang dag par
293b5(phal chen): sgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las dang / nam 'dod pa dang / nam sems bskyed pa na smon lam yongs su rdzogs par sems can la yang dag par ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi las so/ /kye rgyal
293b6(phal chen): ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rgya chen po bla na med
293b7(phal chen): pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba med pas/ byang
294a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa med pa'o/ /'gro ba thams cad du mi dmigs pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa'o/ /'jig rten thams
294a2(phal chen): cad kyis dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni bden pa ma yin pa'o/ /'jig rten gyi bden pa rnam par dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems
294a3(phal chen): dpa'i lus ni rdzun ma yin pa'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rgyun mi zad pa'o/ /bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pas/ byang chub
294a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni brtan pa'o/ /bdud kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi sgul bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni sra ba'o/ /bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan gyis shin tu
294a5(phal chen): rnam par dag par snang bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i mthar thug pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni
294a6(phal chen): mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni
294a7(phal chen): kun tu song ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
294b1(phal chen): sku mi zad pa/ bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
294b2(phal chen): khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad du sgo yongs su stan pa'i lus kyi las dang / skye ba thams cad
294b3(phal chen): du gnas pa'i lus kyi las dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang /
294b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lag pa gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang / khor yug dang / rdo rje'i ri thams cad lag pa gcig gis nyug pa'i lus kyi
294b5(phal chen): las dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus 'jig pa dang / 'byung ba yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis
294b6(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus kyi las dang / /sems can gyi khams thams cad lus med par khong du chud pas zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu ston pa'i
294b7(phal chen): lus kyi las so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
295a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gro ba kun gyis rnam par rig par bya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
295a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nan tan dang ldan pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong
295a3(phal chen): pas| bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyi len kyang yongs su mi skyo bas/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro
295a4(phal chen): ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang / 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang
295a5(phal chen): gcig tu 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad las 'das pas chos kyi rang bzhin dang / thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pas/ thams cad
295a6(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang / nam 'dod pa'i dus su mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
295a7(phal chen): rgya bas/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams
295b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/ bcu gang
295b2(phal chen): zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems sim par byed pas/ byang chub
295b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snyan pa'o/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni mi rdzun pa'o/ /rmi lam na yang log par mi smra
295b4(phal chen): bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas/ byang chub sems
295b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/ /chos bstan pa thams cad mi zad pas/
295b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o/ /sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o/ /dus
295b7(phal chen): dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa
296a1(phal chen): la 'jug par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la bgro ba'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
296a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/ de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i
296a3(phal chen): sras| byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam par dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa
296a4(phal chen): yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su
296a5(phal chen): spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mthar ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba dang mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du
296a6(phal chen): bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa brjod
296a7(phal chen): pas yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pas yongs su dag pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol
296b1(phal chen): ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon sum du chos thos nas/ rang gi lus 'bul
296b2(phal chen): bas yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su gtong bas yongs
296b3(phal chen): su dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'
296b4(phal chen): rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa de yang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus yongs su gzung bar 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis
296b5(phal chen): yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/ klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /
296b6(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang
296b7(phal chen): po la sogs pa chos su smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni yongs su 'dzin pa bcu po de dag gis
297a1(phal chen): shin tu gzung bar 'byung ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu gzung bar 'byung ba de yang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub
297a2(phal chen): par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do/ /dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed
297a3(phal chen): do| |mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do/ /nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do/ /bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do/ /bsam pa'i khams sbyong bar byed do/ /
297a4(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /chos kyi khams rgyas par byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed do/ /dgos pa bcu
297a5(phal chen): po de dag yongs su sgrub bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
297a6(phal chen): dag par 'dzin cing ston pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la
297a7(phal chen): zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i
297b1(phal chen): phyir| byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor
297b2(phal chen): bu rin po che lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams
297b3(phal chen): cad kyis mi sgul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shigs pa lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi
297b4(phal chen): gos pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni pad+mo lta bu'o/ /bskal pa thams cad du 'byung ba dang / mthong bar dka' bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
297b5(phal chen): ni me tog u du ma wa ra lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni
297b6(phal chen): nyi ma lta bu'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis brjod du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni bar snang lta bu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras| bcu po de dag ni/ byang
297b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/ de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgya chen po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa
